summary.span: 在可自定义的网格中显示数据。

span.span: Displays data in a customizable grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件用于显示数据提供可自定义的表。The control provides a customizable table for displaying data. 类允许的单元格、 行、 列和通过使用属性的边框的自定义项，如， ， ，和。The class allows customization of cells, rows, columns, and borders through the use of properties such as , , , and . 有关详细信息，请参阅[基本格式设置和 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/basic-formatting-and-styling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Basic Formatting and Styling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/basic-formatting-and-styling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 你可以使用控件来显示数据源或没有基础数据源。You can use a control to display data with or without an underlying data source. 如果不指定数据源，你可以创建列和包含数据，并将它们直接添加的行使用和属性。Without specifying a data source, you can create columns and rows that contain data and add them directly to the using the and properties. 你还可以使用集合来访问对象和属性来直接读取或写入单元格的值。You can also use the collection to access objects and the property to read or write cell values directly. 索引器还提供对单元格的直接访问。The indexer also provides direct access to cells. 手动填充控件的替代方法，你可以将设置和属性将绑定到数据源，并自动将其填充数据。As an alternative to populating the control manually, you can set the and properties to bind the to a data source and automatically populate it with data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中显示数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Displaying Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 当使用的数据量非常大，您可以设置属性`true`来显示可用数据的子集。When working with very large amounts of data, you can set the property to `true` to display a subset of the available data. 虚拟模式需要实现的数据缓存从其控件中填充。Virtual mode requires the implementation of a data cache from which the control is populated. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的数据显示模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/data-display-modes-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Data Display Modes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/data-display-modes-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关中可用的功能的其他信息控制，请参阅[DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/datagridview-control-windows-forms.md)。For additional information about the features available in the control, see [DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/datagridview-control-windows-forms.md). 下表提供常见任务的直接的链接。The following table provides direct links to common tasks. - [如何：将数据绑定到 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbk67b6z\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbk67b6z\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：向 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的各个单元格添加工具提示](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2249cf0a\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2249cf0a\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中设置字体和颜色样式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z2akwyy7\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Set Font and Color Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z2akwyy7\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：使用设计器更改 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 列类型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/053656ss\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Change the Type of a Windows Forms DataGridView Column Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/053656ss\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：使用设计器将数据绑定到 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/33w255ac\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/33w255ac\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：使用设计器设置 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的默认单元格样式和数据格式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/95y5fz2x\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Set Default Cell Styles and Data Formats for the Windows Forms DataGridView Control Using the Designer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/95y5fz2x\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中设置数据格式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9x2790s\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Format Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9x2790s\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [演练：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中验证数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ykdxa0bc\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[Walkthrough: Validating Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ykdxa0bc\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [如何：在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中自定义数据格式设置](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z1cc356h\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z1cc356h\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [演练：使用两个 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件创建主窗体/详细信息窗体](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/y8c0cxey\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[Walkthrough: Creating a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/y8c0cxey\(v=vs.110\).aspx) 尽管控件替换，并将功能添加到的早期版本中，控件控制保留向后兼容性和将来使用，如果你选择。Although the control replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, the control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件与 DataGrid 控件之间的区别](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md)。For more information, see [Differences Between the Windows Forms DataGridView and DataGrid Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md). > [!NOTE] > 控件继承同时和属性从，但仅支持属性。The control inherits both the and properties from , but supports only the property. 使用具有属性控件不起作用。Using the property with the control has no effect. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化一个未绑定控件。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize an unbound control. span.span: Notifies the accessible client applications when a new cell becomes the current cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将转换到指定的行和列索引`objectID`和`childID`参数和调用方法重载两次使用和值枚举。This method converts the specified row and column indexes into `objectID` and `childID` parameters and calls the method overload twice using the and values of the enumeration. `objectID`和`childID`由编号顺序显示，如果它们是可见且从 1 开始计数的行或列的标头的可见的行和列。The `objectID` and `childID` are determined by numbering only the visible rows and columns in their display order, counting the row or column headers if they are visible, and starting with 1. 例如，如果列标题是否可见，`objectID`对于第一个可见非标头行为 2。For example, if column headers are visible, the `objectID` for the first visible nonheader row is 2.

exception.span: 的 属性值小于 0 或大于控件中的列数减 1。

span.span: The value of the property of is less than 0 or greater than the number of columns in the control minus 1.

exception.span: 或

exception.span: 的 属性值小于 0 或大于控件中的行数减 1。

span.span: The value of the property of is less than 0 or greater than the number of rows in the control minus 1.

para.span: 自定义时重写此方法控件并修改当前单元格如何以及何时更改。

span.span: Override this method when customizing the control and modifying how and when the current cell changes.

para.span: 例如，如果创建将多个单元格合并为单个单元格的自定义的行类型，并且相应地修改导航，你可以重写该方法以提供辅助功能支持所做的更改。

span.span: For example, if you create a custom row type that merges multiple cells into single cells and you modify the navigation accordingly, you can override this method to provide accessibility support for your changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用对列重新定位后，用户可以将列标头拖动到新位置。When column repositioning is enabled, users can drag a column header to a new position. 请注意，冻结和解冻的列组成的两个单独的组;用户可重新定位在组中，列，但不能将列从一个组移到其他。Note that frozen and unfrozen columns form two separate groups; users can reposition columns within a group, but cannot move a column from one group to the other. > [!NOTE] > 控件不支持双缓冲。The control does not support double buffering. 如果设置为`true`中派生控件，用户将不会收到可视反馈，或对列重新排序时调整行、 列或标头的大小。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在主要用于显示的控件。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性以防止用户手动更改列宽。Use this property to prevent users from manually changing column widths. 这非常有用，例如，仅显示列，一次加载数据，并且列在该时间调整大小时。This is useful, for example, with display-only columns where data is loaded once and columns are resized at that time. 有关用户调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控件不支持双缓冲。The control does not support double buffering. 如果设置为`true`中派生控件，用户将不会收到可视反馈，或对列重新排序时调整行、 列或标头的大小。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在主要用于显示的控件。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性以防止用户手动更改行高。Use this property to prevent users from manually changing row heights. 这非常有用，例如，仅显示控件，数据加载一次并且行的大小在该时间。This is useful, for example, with display-only controls where data is loaded once and rows are resized at that time. 对于行调整大小时换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式属性值。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关用户调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控件不支持双缓冲。The control does not support double buffering. 如果设置为`true`中派生控件，用户将不会收到可视反馈，或对列重新排序时调整行、 列或标头的大小。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在主要用于显示的控件。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. summary.span: 获取或设置应用于 的奇数行的默认单元格样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the default cell style applied to odd-numbered rows of the .

value.span: 一个应用于奇数行的 。

span.span: A to apply to the odd-numbered rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将显示其使用指示的单元格的样式的单元格属性，该类继承自其他类型的属性的样式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 通过指定的样式具有奇数索引号的行中的单元格，为属性重写通过指定的样式， ，和，重写了通过指定的样式和和属性。For cells in rows with odd index numbers, the styles specified through the property override the styles specified through the , , and , and are overridden by the styles specified through the and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 获取此属性时如果未访问属性，则将创建具有默认值。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 获取此属性为多个行时，这可能导致性能造成负面影响。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 只要有可能，使用单个设置此属性对于多个行。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性来创建在帐目型效果控件。The following code example illustrates how to use this property to create a ledger effect in a control. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合不对于大型选择有效地执行。The collection does not perform efficiently with large selections. 若要确定是否中的所有单元格之前访问的内容已选择集合，检查返回值的方法。To determine whether all the cells in the have been selected before you access the contents of the collection, check the return value of the method. 但是，此方法可以使行成为非共享行。However, this method can cause rows to become unshared. 有关详细信息性能，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about performance, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法可避免计算涉及集合。The following code example illustrates how to use this method to avoid calculations involving the collection. MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutoGenerateColumns { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在设置 或 属性时是否自动创建列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether columns are created automatically when the or properties are set.

value.span: 如果应自动创建列，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the columns should be created automatically; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置为时自动生成列`true`和或设置或更改属性。Columns are automatically generated when this property is set to `true` and the or properties are set or changed. 列也可以自动时生成属性更改从`false`到`true`。Columns can also be automatically generated when the property is changed from `false` to `true`. 如果此属性为`true`和更改，以使不匹配的前一个列的列值，不匹配的列中的数据将被丢弃。If this property is `true` and the changes so there are columns that do not match the columns of the previous value, data in the unmatched columns is discarded. 如果忽略此属性或未设置属性。This property is ignored if the or properties are not set. 当设置为`true`、控件数据源中生成对象的每个公共属性的一个列。When is set to `true`, the control generates one column for each public property of the objects in the data source. 如果绑定的对象实现接口，该控件生成一列以返回每个属性进行方法。If the bound objects implement the interface, the control generates one column for each property returned by the method. 每个列标题将包含列表示的属性名称的值。Each column header will contain the value of the property name the column represents. 如果你设置属性，但不是集到`false`，您必须手动添加列。If you set the property but set to `false`, you must add columns manually. 你可以通过设置将每个添加的列绑定到数据源到由绑定的对象公开的属性的名称的属性。You can bind each added column to the data source by setting the property to the name of a property exposed by the bound objects. > [!NOTE] > 设置在 Windows 窗体设计器会自动设置属性`false`，生成代码以添加并将绑定数据源中的每个属性的列。Setting the in the Windows Forms Designer automatically sets the property to `false` and generates code to add and bind a column for each property in the data source. 在设计时生成的代码是等效于以下示例所示手动添加代码。The code that is generated at design-time is equivalent to the manually added code shown in the following example. 不是在发生的运行时的列自动生成相同时属性设置为`true`。It is not the same as the auto-generation of columns at run-time that occurs when the property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何手动添加列并将它们绑定到数据源中，当你设置到`false`。The following code example demonstrates how to add columns manually and bind them to a data source when you set to `false`. 在此示例中，控件绑定到的列表`Task`业务对象。In this example, a control is bound to a list of `Task` business objects. 然后，添加列，并绑定到`Task`属性通过属性。Then, columns are added and are bound to `Task` properties through the property. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 访问 Windows 窗体 DataGridViewComboBoxCell 下拉列表中的对象](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Access Objects in a Windows Forms DataGridViewComboBoxCell Drop-Down List](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/vb/form1.vb#100)]

span.span: Adjusts the width of the specified column to fit the contents of its cells.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AutoResizeColumn(int32 columnIndex) cil managed

param.name: columnIndex
param.span: 要调整大小的列的索引。

span.span: The index of the column to resize.

summary.span: 调整指定列的宽度以适应其所有单元格（包括标题单元格）的内容。

span.span: Adjusts the width of the specified column to fit the contents of all its cells, including the header cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制列调整大小时。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽度如果列更高版本的内容更改，则该列将不会自动调整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要调整所有列的都大小，使用方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，使用属性或列属性。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此方法以使足够大以容纳新的单元格值的列宽度。The following code example uses this method to make the column width large enough to accommodate a new cell value. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#211](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewRowDemo.cpp#211)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#211](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewRowDemo.cs#211)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#211](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewrowdemo.vb#211)]

summary.span: 使用指定的大小调整模式调整指定列的宽度。

span.span: Adjusts the width of the specified column using the specified size mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制列调整大小时。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽度如果列更高版本的内容更改，则该列将不会自动调整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要调整所有列的都大小，使用方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，使用属性或列属性。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 此重载允许您指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的单元格，例如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此方法以使足够大以容纳新的单元格值的列宽度。The following code example uses this method to make the column width large enough to accommodate a new cell value. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制列调整大小时。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽度如果列更高版本的内容更改，则该列将不会自动调整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要调整所有列的都大小，使用方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，使用属性或列属性。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 此重载允许您指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的单元格，例如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 此重载受保护，旨在使你能够实现在派生的理想的单元格高度宽度比率类。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedHeight`是`false`，使用你将在调用的假定条件下计算的列宽度或方法下一步。If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column width will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制当调整列标题。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize. 每个方法调用; 一次调整列标题的高度如果后来更改标头，列该列标头将的内容不会自动调整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的列标头，使用属性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 调整列标题中的大小换行为多行的单元格内容，对于的单元格样式必须具有属性值。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调整列标题并单击某个按钮后的行。The following code example demonstrates how to resize column headers and rows as a result of a button click. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制列标题进行大小调整只会在指定列中标题内容的用户编辑或更改的结果更改到绑定的数据源。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified column have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source. 列标题的高度调整一次每个方法调用如果内容的更改要求如果后来更改标头，列该列标头将的内容不会自动调整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的列标头，使用属性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 调整列标题中的大小换行为多行的单元格内容，对于的单元格样式必须具有属性值。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

summary.span: 调整列标题的高度以适应其内容，还可以选择在列和/或行标题的宽度随后进行调整的假定条件下计算高度。

span.span: Adjusts the height of the column headers to fit their contents, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that the column and/or row header widths will subsequently be adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制当调整列标题。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize. 每个方法调用; 一次调整列标题的高度如果后来更改标头，列该列标头将的内容不会自动调整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的列标头，使用属性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 调整列标题中的大小换行为多行的单元格内容，对于的单元格样式必须具有属性值。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 此重载受保护，旨在使你能够实现在派生的理想的单元格高度宽度比率类。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedColumnsWidth`或`fixedRowHeadersWidth`参数`false`，使用将如调用方法的假定条件下计算的列标题的高度和下一步。If the `fixedColumnsWidth` or `fixedRowHeadersWidth` parameters are `false`, the height of the column headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the methods such as and next. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制调整列大小。This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize. 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽如果更高版本的列的内容更改，则列将不会自动调整。The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust. 若要调整大小的特定列，请使用方法。To resize a specific column, use the method. 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，使用属性或列属性。To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property or the column property. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例调整所有列调整为合适的列和列标题的内容。The following code example resizes all columns to fit the contents of the columns and the column headers. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 以编程方式调整大小到内容适应 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). summary.span: 使用指定的大小调整模式调整所有列的宽度。

span.span: Adjusts the width of all columns using the specified size mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制调整列大小。This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize. 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽如果更高版本的列的内容更改，则列将不会自动调整。The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust. 若要调整大小的特定列，请使用方法。To resize a specific column, use the method. 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，使用属性或列属性。To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property or the column property. 此重载允许您指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的单元格，例如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new widths based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例调整所有列调整为合适的列和列标题的内容。The following code example resizes all columns to fit the contents of the columns and the column headers. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 以编程方式调整大小到内容适应 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制调整列大小。This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize. 每个方法调用; 一次调整列宽如果更高版本的列的内容更改，则列将不会自动调整。The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust. 若要调整大小的特定列，请使用方法。To resize a specific column, use the method. 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的列，使用属性或列属性。To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property or the column property. 此重载允许您指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的单元格，例如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new widths based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 此重载受保护，旨在使你能够实现在派生的理想的单元格高度宽度比率类。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedHeight`是`false`，使用你将在调用的假定条件下计算的列宽或方法下一步。If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column widths will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果你想要控制调整行大小。This method is useful if you want to control when a row resizes. 每个方法调用; 一次调整行高如果行更高版本的内容更改，则行将不会自动调整。The row height is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row later change, the row will not automatically adjust. 若要调整大小的所有行，请使用方法。To resize all rows, use the method. 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的行，使用属性。To set the row to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property. 对于行调整大小时换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式属性值。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例调整大小时中的第三个行以适应列内容。The following code example resizes the third row in a to fit the column contents. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 以编程方式调整大小到内容适应 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制行标题进行大小调整。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize. 每个方法调用; 一次调整行标题的宽度如果后来更改标头，行行标头将的内容不会自动调整。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的行标头，使用属性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 此方法允许你指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的标头，如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

span.span: Adjusts the width of the row headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified row and using the specified size mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制行标题进行大小调整只会到绑定的数据源中指定的行的标头的内容更改用户编辑或更改的结果。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified row have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source. 行标题的宽度调整一次每个方法调用如果内容的更改要求如果后来更改标头，行行标头将的内容不会自动调整。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的行标头，使用属性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 此方法允许你指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的标头，如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以调整大小基于对的第一行的标题内容的更改在行标题的宽度。The following code example illustrates how to resize the row header widths based on changes to the contents of the first row header. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 以编程方式调整大小到内容适应 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制行标题进行大小调整。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize. 每个方法调用; 一次调整行标题的宽度如果后来更改标头，行行标头将的内容不会自动调整。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的行标头，使用属性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 此方法允许你指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的标头，如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 此重载受保护，旨在使你能够实现在派生的理想的单元格高度宽度比率类。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedColumnHeadersHeight`或`fixedRowsHeight`参数`false`，使用将如调用方法的假定条件下计算的行标题的宽度和下一步。If the `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` or `fixedRowsHeight` parameters are `false`, the width of the row headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call methods such as and next. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制行标题进行大小调整只会到绑定的数据源中指定的行的标头的内容更改用户编辑或更改的结果。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified row have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source. 行标题的宽度调整一次每个方法调用如果内容的更改要求如果后来更改标头，行行标头将的内容不会自动调整。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要设置要在其内容更改时自动调整大小的行标头，使用属性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 此方法允许你指定计算新宽度基于一组有限的标头，如中显示的行中的值的大小调整模式。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 当控件包含大量行时，这可以提高性能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 此重载受到保护，并旨在使你能够实现在派生的理想的单元格高度宽度比率类。This overload is protected, and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedColumnHeadersHeight`或`fixedRowHeight`参数`false`，使用将如调用方法的假定条件下计算的行标题的宽度和下一步。If the `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` or `fixedRowHeight` parameters are `false`, the width of the row headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call methods such as and next. 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法很有用，如果您要控制调整行大小。This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize. 每个方法调用; 一次调整行高如果行更高版本的内容更改，则行将不会自动调整。The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust. 若要调整大小的特定行，请使用方法。To resize a specific row, use the method. 若要调整大小的行的子集，请使用重载。To resize a subset of rows, use the overload. 若要设置其内容更改时自动调整大小的行，使用属性。To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property. 对于行调整大小时换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式属性值。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关以编程方式调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调整基于非标头单元格内容的所有行的都大小。The following code example demonstrates how to resize all rows based on non-header cell content. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 以编程方式调整大小到内容适应 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许您配置控件，以便以填充整个控件，或以适应单元格内容自动调整列宽。This property lets you configure the control so that column widths are automatically adjusted either to fill the control or to fit cell contents. 当发生更改时控件的宽度，则将发生大小调整填充模式中。Size adjustments occur in fill mode whenever the width of the control changes. 在基于内容的大小调整模式下，大小调整单元格内容更改时，或者会发生，一旦启用，每当更改行高。In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if is enabled, whenever row heights change. 某些基于内容的大小调整模式，可以限制对当前显示的行大小调整，以提高性能。Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance. 若要更改为单个列的大小调整模式，设置其属性。To change the sizing mode for an individual column, set its property. 此属性的默认值是，，该值指示列继承其行为并将其从控件的属性值。The default value of this property is , indicating that the column inherits its behavior and its property value from the control. 列填充模式中的将由所指示的比例的可用控件宽度划分其属性值。Columns in fill mode divide the available control width in proportions indicated by their property values. 通过减去从控件的客户端区域的宽度的所有其他列的宽度确定可用于填充模式的宽度。The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control. 如果此宽度小于组合所有填充模式列的值，显示水平滚动条，所有填充模式列在都显示时带有最小宽度，并且用户列调整大小时被禁用。If this width is smaller than the combined values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled. 有关列填充模式的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列填充模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 只有具有列属性值`true`自动调整大小和更改的列可见性不会导致调整大小时发生。Only columns with a property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur. 此外，在列设置为自动调整大小，则用户不能调整鼠标列宽度。Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse. 若要以编程方式调整列宽，使用或方法或设置列属性。To adjust column widths programmatically, use the or methods or set the column property. 有关基于内容的自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在主/从方案中使用此属性，其中两个控件将显示在父/子关系中两个表中的数据。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a master/detail scenario where two controls display data from two tables in a parent/child relationship. 在此示例中，主机控件的列大小调整模式是，并以编程方式初始化列宽度以适应加载的值。In this example, the column sizing mode for the master control is , and the column widths are programmatically initialized to fit the loaded values. 详细信息控件设置为自动的列大小调整模式，以便在值更改 （例如，当用户更改父表中的当前行） 时，列将会自动调整。The details control is set to an automatic column sizing mode so that columns will adjust automatically whenever the values change (for example, when the user changes the current row in the parent table). 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 创建主/从窗体使用两个 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Create a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md). MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode AutoSizeRowsMode { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示如何确定行高。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating how row heights are determined.

value.span: 一个 值，指示大小调整模式。

span.span: A value indicating the sizing mode.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性，允许您配置控件，使行高度自动调整以适应其内容的内容更改时。This property lets you configure the control so that row heights are automatically adjusted to fit their contents whenever the contents change. 如果是启用，行高也会进行调整列宽更改时。If is enabled, row heights are also adjusted whenever column widths change. 某些大小调整模式，可以限制对当前显示的行大小调整，以提高性能。Some sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance. 仅使用行属性值`true`自动调整大小和更改行的可见性不会导致调整大小时发生。Only rows with a property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a row does not cause resizing to occur. 此外，在行设置为自动调整大小，则用户不能调整行高使用鼠标。Additionally, when rows are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the row heights with the mouse. 自动调整大小的行的值重新计算期间布局以使用的字体的大小。The value of an automatically sized row is recalculated during layout to account for the size of the font that is used. 若要获取正确，应检索窗体的中值而不是在窗体的构造函数中的事件。To get the correct , you should retrieve the value in the form's event instead of in the form's constructor. 若要以编程方式调整行高，请使用或方法，或者设置行属性。To adjust row heights programmatically, use the or methods, or set the row property. 对于行调整大小时换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式属性值。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关基于内容的自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将行设置为自动调整大小基于行标题和的所有列的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to set the row to automatically resize based on the contents of the row headers and all of the columns. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 自动调整大小的单元格时的内容更改 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Automatically Resize Cells When Content Changes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回`false`该单元格无法进入编辑模式，可能会导致大量的原因。This method returns `false` if the cell fails to enter edit mode, which can happen for a number of reasons. 此方法返回`false`如果当前单元格是只读的。This method returns `false` if the current cell is read-only. 它还返回`false`如果单元格属性是`null`（即单元格不能承载编辑控件） 和单元格类型未实现接口。It also returns `false` if the cell property is `null` (meaning the cell cannot host an editing control) and the cell type does not implement the interface. 如果该单元格支持编辑，此方法将引发事件，可以取消，并返回`false`如果事件处理程序取消编辑。If the cell supports editing, this method raises the event, which can be canceled, and returns `false` if an event handler cancels the edit. 如果不取消编辑单元格可以承载的编辑控件，此方法会初始化该控件，并显示它。If the edit is not canceled and the cell can host an editing control, this method initializes the control and displays it. 如果初始化失败，此方法返回`false`。If the initialization fails, this method returns `false`. 如果该单元格成功进入编辑模式，属性返回`true`。If the cell successfully enters edit mode, the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of this method. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CancelRowEdit As QuestionEventHandler

summary.span: 在 控件的 属性为 并且取消行中的编辑时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property of a control is and the cancels edits in a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当是在虚拟模式下，更改会提交到数据缓存在单元格级别默认情况下。When the is in virtual mode, changes are committed to the data cache at the cell level by default. 实现行级事务时，可以使用事件。The event can be used when implementing row-level transactions. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件中的虚拟模式的控件。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event for a control in virtual mode. 当控件处于编辑模式，`rowInEdit`变量保存所编辑的行的索引和`customerInEdit`变量包含对一个对应于该行的客户对象的引用。When the control is in edit mode, the `rowInEdit` variable holds the index of the row being edited, and the `customerInEdit` variable holds a reference to a Customer object corresponding to that row. 当用户取消退出编辑模式时，此对象会被丢弃。When the user cancels out of edit mode, this object can be discarded. 如果用户正在编辑的行是用于新纪录的行，但是，丢弃旧的客户对象的值，并将替换为一个新，以便用户可以开始再次进行的编辑。If the row the user was editing is the row for new records, however, the old Customer object is discarded and replaced with a new one so that the user can begin making edits again. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[演练： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Implementing Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#170](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CPP/virtualmode.cpp#170)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CS/virtualmode.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/VB/virtualmode.vb#170)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellClick As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 在单元格的任何部分被单击时发生。

span.span: Occurs when any part of a cell is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击单元格的任何部分，包括边框和填充时，将发生此事件。This event occurs when any part of a cell is clicked, including borders and padding. 它也会发生当用户按下并释放空间键时的按钮单元格或复选框单元格具有焦点，并且如果按 SPACE 键的同时单击单元格都出现两次针对这些单元格类型。It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACE key while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell is clicked while pressing the SPACE key. 若要确定在单击单元格内容时，处理事件。To determine when the cell contents are clicked, handle the event. 此事件不接收有关鼠标位置的信息。This event does not receive information about the mouse position. 如果事件处理程序需要有关鼠标位置的信息，请使用事件。If the event handler needs information about the mouse position, use the event. 在单击，复选框更改值，因此如果你不想要计算的当前值所基于的预期值之前，会发生此事件，通常将处理事件相反。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 因为该事件发生的用户指定值时才提交，这通常发生时焦点离开单元格，你还必须处理事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在该处理程序，如果当前单元格复选框单元格，调用方法并传入值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件处理程序中使用映像中的列的井游戏实现控件。The following code example shows a event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a control. 除非该游戏已结束，或已单击单元格，事件处理程序会将单元格的值设置为两个一变量所表示的对象`x`和`o`。Unless the game is over or the cell has already been clicked, the event handler sets the cell value to one of two objects represented by the variables `x` and `o`. 此代码是更大的示例中所示的一部分[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的图像列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellContentClick As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 单击单元格的内容时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the content within a cell is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单击单元格内容时，将发生此事件。This event occurs when the cell content is clicked. 它还当用户按下并释放时按钮单元格空格键或复选框单元格具有焦点，并且如果按空格键时，在单击单元格内容将发生这些单元格类型的两次时发生。It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACEBAR while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell content is clicked while pressing the SPACEBAR. 使用此事件来检测为按钮单击事件或单击链接。Use this event to detect button clicks for a or link clicks for a . 在单击，复选框更改值，因此如果你不想要计算的当前值所基于的预期值之前，会发生此事件，通常将处理事件相反。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 因为该事件发生的用户指定值时才提交，这通常发生时焦点离开单元格，你还必须处理事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在该处理程序，如果当前单元格复选框单元格，调用方法并传入值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了确定被单击的单元格是否为链接单元格或按钮单元格，并执行相应的操作，因此此事件的处理程序。The following code example provides a handler for this event that determines whether the clicked cell is a link cell or a button cell and performs the corresponding action as a result. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#60)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#60)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#60)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#286](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#286)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#286](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#286)]

summary.span: 在需要单元格的快捷菜单时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's shortcut menu is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时才会发生时控件设置属性或其属性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 当处理指定处理程序中的快捷菜单显示事件，每当用户右键单击单元格。When you handle the event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell. 如果你想要显示当前状态或单元格的值来确定的快捷菜单，这非常有用。This is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by the current state or value of a cell. 每当也会发生事件的值属性检索时，或者以编程方式或当用户右键单击单元格。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a cell. 你可以使用和属性来确定的状态或值的一个单元格，并使用此信息来更改或修改属性。You can use the and properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性使用单元格的值初始化属性，该事件值重写属性。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 处理事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置单元格的性能损失时多个单元格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 你还可以指定快捷菜单，为各个行而不是通过设置行的各个单元格属性或处理事件。You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row property or handling the event. 单元格属性设置重写行属性设置和事件替代同时事件和行属性设置。The cell property setting overrides the row property setting, and the event overrides both the event and the row property setting. 但是，你可以指定`null`为单元格的快捷菜单，以防止行的快捷菜单重写。However, you can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件处理程序以显示在用户右键单击单元格时使用的自定义的快捷菜单。The following code example demonstrates how to use a event handler to display a custom shortcut menu used when the user right-clicks a cell. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CPP/sharedrows.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CS/sharedrows.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/VB/sharedrows.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 当前选定单元格的编辑模式停止时发生。

span.span: Occurs when edit mode stops for the currently selected cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件以清除行在以前由设置的情况下属性事件处理程序。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to clear the row property in case it was previously set by a event handler. 当新单元格的值符合验证条件，但当用户按 ESC，恢复到旧的单元格值时，事件处理程序可以清除错误文本事件不会发生。The event handler can clear the error text when the new cell value meets the validation criteria, but when the user reverts to the old cell value by pressing ESC, the event does not occur. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[演练： 验证 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-validating-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Validating Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-validating-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). summary.span: 在 控件中的当前单元格更改或者该控件接收到输入焦点时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the current cell changes in the control or when the control receives input focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件不具有输入的焦点并且单击的单元格以前不是当前单元格，为一次单击两次可能发生此事件。This event may occur twice for a single click if the control does not have input focus and the clicked cell was not previously the current cell. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件以更改当前单元格的属性。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the current cell. 在此示例选择背景色设置事件，然后重置为上事件。In this example the selection background color is set in the event, then reset to on the event. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`并确保所有事件都都与其事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#291](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#291)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#291](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#291)]

summary.span: 需要单元格的错误文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's error text is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时才会发生时控件设置属性或其属性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 处理事件非常有用，如果你想要确定具体取决于其值或状态的单元格的错误。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state. 当处理事件，并指定错误文本中处理程序中，在单元格中显示错误标志符号除非属性设置为`false`或单元格处于编辑模式。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode. 当用户移动鼠标指针放在错误图标上方时，错误文本将显示在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 每当也会发生事件的值检索属性。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 你可以使用和属性来确定的状态或值的一个单元格，然后使用此信息来更改或修改属性。You can use the and property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性使用单元格的值初始化属性，该事件值重写属性。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 处理事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置单元格的性能损失时多个单元格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建单元格的错误消息，而无需取消行的共享或导致要复制到所有共享的单元格的单元格错误。The following code example demonstrates how to create error messages for cells without unsharing rows or causing the cell error to be duplicated over all the shared cells. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CPP/sharedrows.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CS/sharedrows.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/VB/sharedrows.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellFormatting As DataGridViewCellFormattingEventHandler

summary.span: 需要设置单元格内容的显示格式时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the contents of a cell need to be formatted for display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，控件将尝试将单元格的值转换为适用于显示的格式。By default, the control will attempt to convert a cell's value into a format suitable for display. 例如，它会将一个数字值转换为以在文本框单元中显示的字符串。For example, it will convert a numerical value into a string for display in a text box cell. 你可以指示要用于通过设置的格式设置约定属性等返回的属性属性。You can indicate the formatting convention to use by setting the property of the returned by properties such as the property. 如果标准的格式设置是不够的可以自定义格式设置通过处理事件。If the standard formatting is insufficient, you can customize the formatting by handling the event. 此事件可以指示的确切显示值，以及单元格样式，如前景色和背景颜色，用于单元格显示。This event lets you indicate the exact display value as well as the cell styles, such as background and foreground color, to use for the cell display. 这意味着你可以处理任何类型的单元格格式，而不考虑是否单元格的值本身需要进行格式设置此事件。This means you can handle this event for any kind of cell formatting, regardless of whether the cell value itself needs formatting. 每次每个单元格绘制，因此，应避免耗时处理处理此事件时，事件时发生。The event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event. 也会发生此事件时该单元格检索或其调用方法。This event also occurs when the cell is retrieved or its method is called. 当处理事件，与单元格的值初始化属性。When you handle the event, the property is initialized with the cell value. 如果你提供从单元格的值的显示值的自定义转换，设置转换后的值，以确保新值所指定单元格的类型属性属性。If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell property. 若要指示没有进一步设置值的格式设置必要，请设置属性`true`。To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the property to `true`. 事件处理程序完成后，如果是`null`或者不是正确的类型，或属性是`false`、格式都是使用， ， ，和属性返回的单元格样式属性，使用该单元格初始化属性。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is formatted using the , , , and properties of the cell style returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 无论的值如何属性，返回的对象的显示属性属性用于呈现该单元格。Regardless of the value of the property, the display properties of the object returned by the property are used to render the cell. 有关自定义格式设置使用的详细信息事件，请参阅[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中自定义数据格式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about custom formatting using the event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要避免处理此事件时出现的性能损失，请通过事件处理程序，而不是直接访问该单元格的参数访问单元格。To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly. 若要自定义格式化、 用户指定的值转换为实际的单元值，处理事件。To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件。The following code example shows how to handle the event. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 单元格失去输入焦点并且不再是当前单元格时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell loses input focus and is no longer the current cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件以更改当前单元格的属性。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the current cell. 在此示例选择背景色设置事件，然后重置为上事件。In this example the selection background color is set in the event, then reset to on the event. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`并确保所有事件都都与其事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellMouseClick As DataGridViewCellMouseEventHandler

summary.span: 在用户用鼠标单击单元格中的任何位置时发生。

span.span: Occurs whenever the user clicks anywhere on a cell with the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击使用任何鼠标按钮时，将发生此事件。This event occurs when the user clicks using any of the mouse buttons. 使用属性来确定被单击的按钮。Use the property to determine which button was clicked. 若要检测单击单元格，如按钮或链接在单元格中，内容使用事件。To detect clicks on the contents of a cell, such as a button or link within a cell, use the event. 此事件的处理程序接收的列索引和鼠标指针位置的行索引。The handler for this event receives the column index and row index of the mouse pointer position. 在单击，复选框更改值，因此如果你不想要计算的当前值所基于的预期值之前，会发生此事件，通常将处理事件相反。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 因为该事件发生的用户指定值时才提交，这通常发生时焦点离开单元格，你还必须处理事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在该处理程序，如果当前单元格复选框单元格，调用方法并传入值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellMouseDown As DataGridViewCellMouseEventHandler

summary.span: 当用户在鼠标指针位于单元格边界内时按鼠标按钮时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user presses a mouse button while the mouse pointer is within the boundaries of a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按下任何鼠标按钮时，将发生此事件。This event occurs when the user presses any of the mouse buttons. 使用属性来确定被单击的按钮。Use the property to determine which button was clicked. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellMouseEnter As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 鼠标指针进入单元格时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the mouse pointer enters a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件处理程序中使用映像中的列的井游戏实现控件。The following code example shows a event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a control. 事件处理程序使用单元格的值来确定的光标和要显示工具提示。The event handler uses the cell value to determine the cursor and ToolTip to display. 此代码是更大的示例中所示的一部分[如何： 使用 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的图像列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
