MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellPainting As DataGridViewCellPaintingEventHandler

summary.span: 需要绘制单元格时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell needs to be drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以处理此事件以自定义控件中的单元格的外观。You can handle this event to customize the appearance of cells in the control. 你可以绘制整个单元格自行，或绘制的单元格的特定部分，并使用或方法来绘制其他部分。You can paint entire cells yourself, or paint specific parts of cells and use the or methods to paint other parts. 你还可以使用类来绘制使用当前主题的标准控件。You can also use the class to paint standard controls using the current theme. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 如果你使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，你可以访问你可以使用的标准映像的大型库控件。If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the control. 处理此事件时，你应通过的参数的事件处理程序中，访问该单元格，而不是直接访问该单元格。When handling this event, you should access the cell through the parameters of the event handler, rather than access the cell directly. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件来自定义的特定列中的所有单元格的外观。The following code example illustrates how to use this event to customize the appearance of all cells in a particular column. 此代码是更大的示例中提供的一部分[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Cells in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellParsing As DataGridViewCellParsingEventHandler

summary.span: 在单元格值已修改的情况下，当单元格退出编辑模式时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell leaves edit mode if the cell value has been modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，控件将尝试将转换为实际的基础的单元格值指定单元格的类型中的单元格中显示的一个用户指定值属性。By default, the control will attempt to convert a user-specified value displayed in a cell to an actual underlying cell value in the type specified by the cell property. 这种转换使用返回的单元格的单元格样式的格式设置属性属性。This conversion uses the formatting properties of the cell style returned by the cell property. 如果标准转换不满足你的需求，处理事件，以便提供自定义值转换为所需的类型。If the standard conversion does not meet your needs, handle the event to provide custom value conversion to the required type. 用户可以进入编辑模式，使用指定的方法属性，并可以退出编辑模式，在单元格中，提交更改，通过将移到另一个单元格或通过按 ENTER。Users can enter edit mode using the method specified by the property, and can leave edit mode, committing any changes to a cell, by moving to another cell or by pressing ENTER. 按 esc 键将恢复任何更改的值，它也会提交之前, 与事件才会发生。Pressing ESC will revert any changes to the value before it is committed, and the event will not occur. 事件才会发生单元格的值实际上已被修改，即使的最终值是与原始值相同。The event occurs only if the cell value has actually been modified, even if the final value is the same as the original value. 它也会发生时调用方法。It also occurs when the method is called. 当处理事件，可以自行转换该值，或者你可以自定义默认转换。When you handle the event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion. 例如，你可以将值转换使用单元格自行与你选择的类型转换器方法。For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell method with type converters of your choosing. 或者，可以让默认类型转换器分析值，但需要修改， ，和返回的对象的属性属性，使用该单元格初始化属性。Alternatively, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the , , and properties of the object returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 当你自行转换该值时，替换初始的格式化值属性中指定单元格的类型的转换值属性。When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell property. 若要指示，没有任何进一步分析是必要的设置属性`true`。To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the property to `true`. 事件处理程序完成后，如果是`null`或者不是正确的类型，或属性是`false`、分析使用的单元格与默认类型转换器方法。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is parsed using the cell method with default type converters. 此方法的默认实现分析值使用， ，和中传递的单元格样式属性。The default implementation of this method parses the value using the , , and properties of the cell style passed in. 如果值不等于，此值被分析使用中传递的属性和类型转换器。If the value is not equal to , the value is parsed using the property and the type converters passed in. 若要自定义显示的格式值的一个单元格值的转换，处理事件。To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件。The following code example shows how to handle the event. 它还演示如何使用类。It also shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellStyleChanged As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 在 的 属性更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property of a changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当任何一个时，将发生此事件的属性返回属性设置为新值时，或者当属性设置为一个新而至少一个属性值不同于上一个单元格样式对象。This event occurs when any property of the returned by a property is set to a new value or when a property is set to a new with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时的一个属性值对象由以下属性更改之一：The event occurs when a property value of a object returned by one of the following properties changes: - - - - - - - - 如果其中一个属性设置为另一种，但相应*PropertyName* `Changed`事件发生，但事件不会发生。If one of these properties is set to a different , however, the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event occurs, but the event does not occur. 有关行、 列和单元属性的名称*PropertyName* `Changed`事件开头"`Row`"，"`Column`"，或"`Cell`"(例如， )。For row, column, and cell properties, the name of the *PropertyName*`Changed` event begins with "`Row`", "`Column`", or "`Cell`" (for example, ). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 需要单元格的工具提示文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's ToolTip text is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时才会发生时控件设置属性或其属性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 当处理处理程序中指定的工具提示文本将显示事件，每当鼠标指针位于单元格和控件属性值是`true`。When you handle the event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control property value is `true`. 事件非常有用，如果你想要显示工具提示当前状态或单元格的值来确定。The event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell. 每当也会发生事件的值属性检索时，或者以编程方式或在鼠标指针进入单元格。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell. 你可以使用和属性来确定的状态或值的一个单元格，并使用此信息来更改或修改属性。You can use the and properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性使用单元格的值初始化属性，该事件值重写属性。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 处理事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置单元格的性能损失时多个单元格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件处理程序中绑定数据显示中隐藏的列信息控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a event handler to display information from hidden columns in a data-bound control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/CS/Form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/VB/Form1.vb#20)]

summary.span: 单元格完成验证时发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理此事件可用于验证后处理的单元格的值。Handling this event is useful for post-validation processing of the cell value. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件来清除属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to clear out the property. 在此示例中，事件集如果用户输入不是有效的单元格中的数据。In this example, the event sets the if the user enters data that is not valid into a cell. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. summary.span: 在单元格失去输入焦点时发生，并启用内容验证功能。

span.span: Occurs when a cell loses input focus, enabling content validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消此事件取消对当前单元格的更改。Canceling this event cancels the changes to the current cell. 如果此事件已取消在数据绑定模式下，新值不是推送到基础数据源。When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source. 在虚拟模式下，取消此事件时不会引发事件。When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the event will not be raised. 处理事件来执行验证之后处理。Handle the event to perform post-validation processing. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件，以确保仅正整数来表示所输入的用户。The following code example handles the event to ensure that only positive integers are entered by the user. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#40)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellValueChanged As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 单元格的值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of a cell changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件发生时的用户指定的值也会提交，这通常发生在焦点离开单元格时。The event occurs when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell. 对于复选框单元格，但是，你将通常想要立即处理更改。In the case of check box cells, however, you will typically want to handle the change immediately. 若要在单击单元格时，请提交更改，你必须处理事件。To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the event. 在处理程序中，如果当前单元格，复选框单元格调用方法并传入值。In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 当更改一个单元格值，控件中的行不会自动进行排序。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when a cell value is changed. 若要在用户修改某个单元格时，排序控件，请调用中的方法事件处理程序。To sort the control when the user modifies a cell, call the method in a event handler. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用事件以更新的平衡列中的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update the values in a balance column of a . 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. summary.span: 在以下情况下发生：当 控件的 属性为 ，并且 只有在单元格中有值的情况下才格式化和显示单元格时。

span.span: Occurs when the property of the control is and the requires a value for a cell in order to format and display the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此事件中的虚拟模式而不会导致要成为非共享行的行填充具有自定义数据存储区中的数据的单元格。Use this event in virtual mode to populate cells with data from a custom data store without causing rows to become unshared. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要将用户指定值添加到自定义数据存储区中，处理事件。To add user-specified values to your custom data store, handle the event. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件以填充单元格的正整数。The following code example handles the event to populate cells with positive integers. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. summary.span: 在以下情况下发生：当 控件的 属性为 ，并且单元格值已更改并需要存储在基础数据源中时。

span.span: Occurs when the property of the control is and a cell value has changed and requires storage in the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此事件中的虚拟模式来使用用户指定的数据更新的自定义数据存储区。Use this event in virtual mode to update a custom data store with user-specified data. 处理事件，以从控件中显示的数据存储中检索值。Handle the event to retrieve values from the data store for display in the control. 有关虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件将更新和新条目存储在数据存储对象。The following code example handles the event to store updates and new entries in a data store object. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用此方法，每个列和行的属性设置为`false`。When this method is called, each column and row's property is set to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例清除选择的。The following code example clears the selection of the . 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`和名为`clearSelectionButton`，并确保所有事件都都与其事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and a named `clearSelectionButton`, and ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. span.span: Cancels the selection of all currently selected cells except the one indicated, optionally ensuring that the indicated cell is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`rowIndexException`值为-1 表示列标题，和一个`columnIndexException`值为-1 表示的行是标题。A `rowIndexException` value of -1 represents a column header, and a `columnIndexException` value of -1 represents a row header. 此方法可用于不取消选择单元格、 行或列由异常索引的情况下清除当前所选内容。This method is useful to clear the current selection without canceling the selection of the cell, row, or column indicated by the exception indexes. 如果属性值允许选择单个单元格，此方法会设置属性的每个单元格`false`，不包括中的行和指定列的单元格。If the property value allows individual cell selection, this method sets the property of each cell to `false`, excluding the cell in the row and column specified. 如果属性值的允许完整行或列的选择此方法还集的每个行或列的属性`false`、 行或列以包含指定的单元格。If the property value allows full row or column selection, this method also sets the property of each row or column to `false`, excluding the row or column containing the specified cell. 排除的单元格、 行或列可能或可能未处于选定状态时调用此方法。The excluded cell, row, or column may or may not be in the selected state when this method is called. 此方法如果选择`selectExceptionElement`参数值是`true`。This method selects it if the `selectExceptionElement` parameter value is `true`. 根据选择模式中，在整个行或列也可能被选择结果。Depending on the selection mode, the entire row or column may also be selected as a result.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode ClipboardCopyMode { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以将单元格的文本值复制到 ，以及是否包括行标题和列标题文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can copy cell text values to the and whether row and column header text is included.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将每个选定的单元格的文本表示复制到剪贴板。The control copies the text representation of each selected cell to the Clipboard. 此值是单元格的值转换为字符串，或对于图像单元格的值属性。This value is the cell value converted to a string or, for image cells, the value of the property. 值复制到剪贴板中， ， ，和格式。Values are copied to the Clipboard in , , , and formats. 这些格式可用于将内容粘贴到应用程序 （如记事本） [!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/includes/ofprword-md.md)]。These formats are useful for pasting content into applications such as Notepad, [!INCLUDE[ofprexcel](~/includes/ofprexcel-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/includes/ofprword-md.md)]. 控件复制中包括所有选定的单元格的最小矩形包含单元格。The control copies the cells contained in the smallest rectangle that includes all selected cells. 行和列不包含任何选定的单元格不在所复制的数据中表示。Rows and columns that do not contain any selected cells are not represented in the copied data. 由空白占位符表示剩余行和列中的所有未选定单元格。Any unselected cells in the remaining rows and columns are represented by blank placeholders. 具体取决于复制模式和选择模式中，复制的行和列的标头值可复制，以及。Depending on the copy mode and the selection mode, header values for the copied rows and columns may be copied, as well. 当用户复制内容，控件将添加到剪贴板。When users copy content, the control adds a to the Clipboard. 此数据对象检索从方法。This data object is retrieved from the method. 当你想要以编程方式将数据对象添加到剪贴板时，你可以调用此方法。You can call this method when you want to programmatically add the data object to the Clipboard. 方法通过调用检索各个单元格的值方法。The method retrieves values for individual cells by calling the method. 您可以重写这两种方法在派生类中自定义的复制的单元格的布局，或以支持其他数据格式或其中任何一个。You can override either or both of these methods in derived classes to customize the layout of copied cells or to support additional data formats. 有关剪贴板操作和数据格式的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about Clipboard operations and data formats, see the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何启用复制中控件。The following code example demonstrates how to enable copying in the control. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 启用用户添加到复制到剪贴板从 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的多个单元](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo/CS/datagridviewclipboarddemo.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo/VB/datagridviewclipboarddemo.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. value.span: 中显示的列数。

span.span: The number of columns displayed in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置属性设为 0，将删除所有列从。Setting the property to 0 will remove all columns from the . 如果重置为一个值小于当前值，列将不再从末尾集合。If is reset to a value less than the current value, columns will be removed from the end of the collection. 如果设置为值大于当前值的情况下，列将添加到末尾集合。If is set to a value greater than the current value, columns will be added to the end of the collection. 此属性可与属性创建一个简单用于显示和编辑文本。This property can be used with the property to create a simple for displaying and editing text. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , , , , , , , , and properties. 此外，此代码示例演示如何设置和属性。In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`，然后调用`SetUpDataGridView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 确保所有事件都都其事件处理程序关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. summary.span: 用户双击两列之间的分隔符时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks a divider between two columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可用于自定义当用户双击列分隔符时发生的自动调整大小行为。You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a column divider. 例如，你可以处理此事件，若要以编程方式调整大小仅根据当前可见的行中的内容的列使用大量的行时避免对性能有影响的默认行为。For example, you can handle this event to programmatically resize columns based only on the content in the rows that are currently visible, avoiding a performance impact with the default behavior when working with a large number of rows. 列属性不会扩展用户可在其中双击的区域。The column property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click. 如果已通过使用此属性增加了分隔符的宽度，则当用户双击分隔线和相邻的列之间的边界发生此事件。If the width of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 当在中单击列标题，默认行为是根据所单击的列，对网格行进行排序，或若要反转排序顺序，如果网格已按所单击的列进行排序。When a column heading is clicked in a , the default behavior is to order the grid rows based on the clicked column, or to reverse the sort order if the grid is already sorted by the clicked column. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件来执行模拟单击的默认行为的编程排序时的默认行为已被禁用。The following code example demonstrates how to use this event to perform a programmatic sort that emulates the default behavior of clicking a when the default behavior has been disabled. 在此示例中，设置为，因此，单击选择列的内容。In this example, the is set to , so clicking the selects the contents of the column. 有关示例代码，以按预期工作，默认列标题，请单击行为需要更改数据加载到每次。For the example code to function as intended, the default column header click behavior needs to be changed each time the data is loaded into the . 添加事件处理程序，提供更改默认的行为的代码。Add a event handler to provide the code that changes the default behavior. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`并确保所有事件都都与其事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为、属性必须为系统颜色。If the property is set to anything other than , the property must be a system color. 无法将此属性设置为值，该值只读的值，指示使用自定义边框样式属性。You cannot set this property to the value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果通过应用程序启用了可视样式方法和属性是`true`，使用当前主题绘制列标题。If visual styles are enabled for the application through the method and the property is `true`, the column headers are painted using the current theme. 在此情况下，值对于除以外的所有列标题，将忽略属性，到未应用主题。In this case, the value of the property is ignored for all column headers except the , to which the theme is not applied. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , , , , , , , , and properties. 此外，此代码示例演示如何设置和属性。In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`，然后调用`SetUpDataGridView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named`dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 确保所有事件都都其事件处理程序关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值返回此属性具有以下的初始属性值：The default returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` 属性`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|默认值Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| || 属性的值。The value of the property.| || 属性的值。The value of the property.| || 属性的值。The value of the property.| || 属性的值。The value of the property.| || 属性的值。The value of the property.| ||| ||| 这些值将自动覆盖通过设置的值属性。These values automatically override the values set through the property. 若要强制列标题来继承值，你必须设置值对象为默认值为指明类。To force column headers to inherit the values, you must set the values in the object to the default values indicated for the class. 有关单元格样式继承的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如果启用了可视样式和设置为`true`，除之外的所有标头单元格使用当前主题绘制和值将被忽略。If visual styles are enabled and is set to `true`, all header cells except the are painted using the current theme and the values are ignored. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , , , , , , , , and properties. 此外，此代码示例演示如何设置和属性。In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`，然后调用`SetUpDataGridView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 确保所有事件都都其事件处理程序关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以调整列标题的高度，以及它是由用户调整还是根据标题的内容自动调整。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the column headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.

value.span: 一个 值，指示可以在什么模式下调整列标题行的高度。

span.span: A value indicating the mode by which the height of the column headers row can be adjusted.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为，不能由用户调整列标题的高度。When this property is set to , the height of the column headers cannot be adjusted by the user. 若要以编程方式调整列标题的高度，使用方法或一组属性。To adjust the height of the column headers programmatically, use the method or set the property. 若要设置行标题的大小调整模式，使用属性。To set the sizing mode for the row headers, use the property. 调整列标题中的大小换行为多行的单元格内容，对于的单元格样式必须具有属性值。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 标头大小有关的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控件不支持双缓冲。The control does not support double buffering. 如果设置为`true`中派生控件，用户将不会收到可视反馈，或对列重新排序时调整行、 列或标头的大小。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在主要用于显示的控件。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法尝试将用户指定的格式化值转换为基础的单元格数据类型。This method attempts to convert the formatted, user-specified value to the underlying cell data type. 若要执行此操作，它会发出事件，你可以处理自定义类型转换。To do this, it raises the event, which you can handle to customize the type conversion. 否则，将使用默认类型转换器。Otherwise, default type converters are used. 转换错误可能会导致异常，如果不处理事件以防止它。Conversion errors may result in an exception if the event is not handled to prevent it. 如果成功转换值，它将提交到数据存储，引发事件未绑定数据的单元格时属性值是`true`。If the value is successfully converted, it is committed to the data store, raising the event for non-data-bound cells when the property value is `true`. 如果该值已成功提交，事件发生。If the value is successfully committed, the event occurs. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用方法内的要引发的事件处理程序事件。The following code example calls the method within a event handler to raise the event. 此代码示例摘自[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的按钮列禁用按钮](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md). MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCell ^ CurrentCell { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCell ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCell ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当前处于活动状态的单元格。

span.span: Gets or sets the currently active cell.

value.span: 表示当前单元格的 ，如果没有当前单元格，则为 。

span.span: The that represents the current cell, or if there is no current cell.

value.span: 默认值是第一列中的第一个单元格，如果控件中没有单元格，则为 。

span.span: The default is the first cell in the first column or if there are no cells in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为当前单元格设置单元格时，它将滚动到视图中，如果当前未显示。When you set a cell as the current cell, it will scroll into view if it is not currently displayed. 当前单元格不能为隐藏的行或列中的标题单元格、 已禁用的单元格或单元格。The current cell cannot be a header cell, a disabled cell, or a cell in a hidden row or column. 你可以将此属性设置为`null`临时删除聚焦框，但当在控件接收焦点，并且此属性的值位于`null`，它自动设置的值为属性。You can set this property to `null` to temporarily remove the focus rectangle, but when the control receives focus and the value of this property is `null`, it is automatically set to the value of the property. 当您更改此属性的值时事件之前发生事件。When you change the value of this property, the event occurs before the event. 任何事件处理程序访问此时属性将获取其以前的值。Any event handler accessing the property at this time will get its previous value. 当绑定到外部数据源时，此属性将重置为其默认值。When you bind the to an external data source, this property is reset to its default value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以确保通过设置排序后对当前单元格是可见通过检索到的单元格的属性属性。The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting by setting the property to the cell retrieved through the property. 此代码仅适用于未绑定控件。This code works only with an unbound control. 与控件绑定到外部数据源，当前单元格时，将不自动保留排序。With a control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`. 在 C# 中，你必须连接到事件处理程序的事件。In C#, you must also connect the event to the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#150)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#150)]

summary.span: 获取当前处于活动状态的单元格的行索引和列索引。

span.span: Gets the row and column indexes of the currently active cell.

value.span: 一个 ，表示当前处于活动状态的单元格的行索引和列索引。

span.span: A that represents the row and column indexes of the currently active cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于确定无需直接访问该单元格的行和当前的单元格的列。Use this property to determine the row and column of the current cell without accessing the cell directly. 这可用于避免取消共享的行。This is useful to avoid unsharing shared rows. 有关行共享的详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在行绘制方案中的属性。The following code example illustrates how to use the property in a row-painting scenario. 在示例中，此属性用于存储当前单元格的行索引。In the example, this property is used to store the row index of the current cell. 当用户更改为不同的行的当前单元格时，该行将强制重新绘制自身。When the user changes the current cell to a different row, the row is forced to repaint itself. 此代码是更大的示例中提供的一部分[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#19)]

summary.span: 单元格状态因其内容更改而更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the state of a cell changes in relation to a change in its contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单元格被标记为已修改如果其内容已更改，但不是保存更改。A cell is marked as modified if its contents have changed but the change has not been saved. 当编辑单元格，但更改尚未提交到数据缓存中，或者编辑操作被取消时，通常会发生此事件。This event typically occurs when a cell has been edited but the change has not been committed to the data cache, or when an edit operation is canceled. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. 在此示例中，该事件处理程序调用方法来引发事件，并确定的当前值。In this example, the event handler calls the method to raise the event and determine the current value of a . 此代码示例摘自[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的按钮列禁用按钮](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 或数据的内容源更改时，将引发此事件的值， ，或属性更改。This event is raised when the contents of the data source change or when the value of the , , or property changes. 处理此事件很有用，例如，若要以编程方式调整大小的行和列基于内容的更新。Handling this event is useful, for example, to programmatically resize rows and columns based on content updates. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此事件。The following code example illustrates the use of this event. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. summary.span: 在以下情况下发生：当外部数据分析或验证操作引发异常时，或者当尝试将数据提交到数据源失败时。

span.span: Occurs when an external data-parsing or validation operation throws an exception, or when an attempt to commit data to a data source fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件使你能够处理由该控件调用数据处理操作期间的代码中引发的异常。The event enables you to handle exceptions thrown in code that is called by the control during data processing operations. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!NOTE] > 和属性通常与此事件关联的对象指示发生数据错误该单元格。The and properties of the object associated with this event normally indicate the cell in which the data error occurred. 外部数据源错误时，但是，数据源可能无法提供发生错误的列。When the error occurs in an external data source, however, the data source may not provide the column in which the error occurred. 在这种情况下，属性通常在出错时指示当前单元格的列。In this case, the property typically indicates the column of the current cell at the time of the error. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示事件处理程序。The following code example demonstrates a event handler. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在绑定到包含多个列表或表的数据源时，此属性很有用。This property is useful when binding to a data source that contains multiple lists or tables. 不需要设置此属性，当绑定到数据源包含单个列表或表。You do not need to set this property when binding to a data source that contains a single list or table. 例如，你可以将绑定控制转移到而无需设置此属性包含单个表。For example, you can bind a control to a that contains a single table without setting this property. 如果包含多个表，但是，你必须将此属性设置为其中一个表的名称。If the contains multiple tables, however, you must set this property to the name of one of the tables. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了此属性的一个常见用途。The following code example illustrates a common use for this property. 在示例中，控件名为`customersDataGridView`绑定到名为`customersDataSet`。In the example, a control named `customersDataGridView` is bound to a named `customersDataSet`. 这包含名为"客户"的表。This contains a table named "Customers". 属性设置为表的名称。The property is set to the name of the table. summary.span: 获取或设置 所显示数据的数据源。

span.span: Gets or sets the data source that the is displaying data for.

value.span: 包括要显示的 的数据的对象。

span.span: The object that contains data for the to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类支持标准 Windows 窗体数据绑定模型。The class supports the standard Windows Forms data-binding model. 这意味着数据源可以是任何类型的实现以下接口之一：This means the data source can be of any type that implements one of the following interfaces: - 接口，包括一维数组。The interface, including one-dimensional arrays. - 接口，如和类。The interface, such as the and classes. - 接口，如类。The interface, such as the class. - 接口，如类。The interface, such as the class. 有关具体示例，请参阅示例部分和在本部分末尾的任务表。For specific examples, see the Example section and the task table at the end of this section. 通常情况下，将绑定到组件和绑定组件与另一个数据源，或者使用业务对象填充它。Typically, you will bind to a component and bind the component to another data source or populate it with business objects. 组件是首选的数据源，因为它可以将绑定到各种数据源，并可以自动解决许多数据绑定问题。The component is the preferred data source because it can bind to a wide variety of data sources and can resolve many data binding issues automatically. 当绑定到数据源包含多个列表或表时，必须设置属性设置为一个字符串，指定要绑定到表的列表。When binding to a data source that contains multiple lists or tables, you must set the property to a string that specifies the list or table to bind to. 绑定到时包含多个列表或表，不过的组件，你可以设置属性组件相反。When binding to a component that contains multiple lists or tables, however, you can set the property of the component instead. 当绑定到的对象集合，而不数据库数据时，通常将设置属性返回的对象属性`null`而不是使用的默认值，即适用于数据库数据。When binding to an object collection rather than to database data, you will typically set the property of the object returned by the property to `null` rather than using the default value of , which is appropriate for database data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中显示数据](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Displaying Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 下表提供了直接链接到相关的常见任务属性。The following table provides direct links to common tasks related to the property. 请参阅[演练： 创建主/从窗体使用两个 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/creating-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md)和[如何： 将对象绑定到 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-objects-to-windows-forms-datagridview-controls.md)。See [Walkthrough: Creating a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/creating-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md) and [How to: Bind Objects to Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-objects-to-windows-forms-datagridview-controls.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化简单数据绑定。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a simple data-bound . 它还演示如何设置属性。It also demonstrates how to set the property. summary.span: 在未设置其他单元格样式属性的情况下，获取或设置应用于 中的单元格的默认单元格样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the default cell style to be applied to the cells in the if no other cell style properties are set.

value.span: 作为默认样式应用的 。

span.span: The to be applied as the default style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将显示其使用指示的单元格的样式的单元格属性，该类继承自其他类型的属性的样式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 通过指定的样式属性将影响所有单元格除外时重写通过以下属性指定的样式：The styles specified through the property affect all cells except when overridden by the styles specified through the following properties: - - - - - 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 获取此属性时如果未访问属性，则将创建具有默认值。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 获取此属性为多个行时，这可能导致性能造成负面影响。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 只要有可能，使用单个设置此属性对于多个行。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在主要用于显示的控件。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DefaultValuesNeeded As DataGridViewRowEventHandler

summary.span: 用户输入新记录行以便可以使用默认值填充该行时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user enters the row for new records so that it can be populated with default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可让你填充用于新纪录的行，当用户输入行。This event lets you populate the row for new records when the user enters the row. 初始行值来自属性每个列返回属性。Initial values for the row come from the property of the returned by each column's property. 在数据绑定模式下，所有单元格绑定的列都存储在外部数据源中的数据的值。In data bound mode, all cell values for data bound columns are stored in the external data source. 当用户输入新记录的行时中的数据源之前创建的新行事件发生。When the user enters the row for new records, a new row is created in the data source before the event occurs. 当填充属性在事件处理程序，可以直接到数据源中添加值。When you populate the property in your event handler, the values are added directly to the data source. 在虚拟模式下，此事件发生后,每个单元格在新行中发生的事件，以便你可以在自定义数据存储区中存储的默认值。In virtual mode, after this event occurs, the event occurs for each cell in the new row so that you can store the default values in your custom data store. 然后，事件发生在新行中，每个单元格检索中存储的值事件，然后显示。Then, the event occurs for each cell in the new row, retrieving the values that you stored in the event, which are then displayed. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了如何可以处理此事件。The following code example illustrates how this event can be handled. 在示例中，默认值填充单元格，给定的列。In the example, cells for the given columns are populated with default values. 有关`CustomerID`列中，值从单独的方法 （未实现），生成唯一的客户 id。For the `CustomerID` column, the value is retrieved from a separate method (not implemented) that generates a unique customer ID. 若要运行此示例中，将列名称，从实际的列对象的名称替换控制并提供适当的默认值。To run this example, replace the column names with the names of the column objects from an actual control and provide appropriate default values. 当按名称指定列，必须使用的列对象并不列标题文本的名称。When specifying columns by name, you must use the name of the column object and not the column header text. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#120)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该单元格不处于编辑模式，或单元格类型不适用于编辑控件，此属性返回`null`。If the cell is not in edit mode or the cell type does not accommodate an editing control, this property returns `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了如何在自定义单元格类型的重写方法中使用此属性。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in an overridden method of a custom cell type. 在示例中，对编辑的控件的引用是检索、 强制转换为自定义编辑的控件类型，然后填充单元格的当前值。In the example, a reference to the editing control is retrieved, cast to a custom editing control type, and then populated with the current value of the cell. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格的主机控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#210](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#210)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#210](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#210)]

summary.span: 显示用于编辑单元格的控件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control for editing a cell is showing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以处理此事件时要执行的编辑控件的自定义初始化在单元格进入编辑模式。You can handle this event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode. 若要自定义控件的显示特征，设置返回的对象的属性属性。To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the property. 若要执行其他初始化，将值强制转换的属性设置为特定于控件类型，并直接访问的成员。To perform other initialization, cast the value of the property to the specific control type and access the members directly. 例如，你可以处理将事件处理程序附加到的编辑控件的事件的事件。For example, you can handle the event to attach event-handlers to the events of the editing control. > [!NOTE] > 控制一次承载一个编辑控件和重复使用编辑控件，每当编辑之间不发生更改的单元格类型。The control hosts one editing control at a time, and reuses the editing control whenever the cell type does not change between edits. 将事件处理程序附加到编辑控件，因此必须采取预防措施以避免多次附加同一处理程序。When attaching event-handlers to the editing control, you must therefore take precautions to avoid attaching the same handler multiple times. 若要避免此问题，请移除之前将该处理程序附加到事件的事件处理程序。To avoid this problem, remove the handler from the event before you attach the handler to the event. 这将防止重复，如果处理程序已连接到的事件，但将不起任何作用。This will prevent duplication if the handler is already attached to the event, but will have no effect otherwise. 有关详细信息，请参阅中的代码示例类概述。For more information, see the example code in the class overview. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件以更改当前单元格的属性。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the current cell. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`并确保事件是与事件处理程序关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that the event is associated with the event handler. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过调用你的应用程序中启用视觉样式方法之前调用方法。You can enable visual styles for your application by calling the method before calling the method. 如果设置为`true`，除之外的所有标头单元格使用当前主题绘制。If is set to `true`, all header cells except the are painted using the current theme. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何禁用行和列中的标头的应用程序已启用视觉样式的视觉样式。The following code example demonstrates how to disable visual styles for the row and column headers in an application that has visual styles enabled. 在此示例中，视觉样式启用了应用程序通过调用中的方法`Main`。In this example, visual styles have been enabled for the application by calling the method in `Main`. 但是，视觉样式将不会应用于行和列标题因为设置为`false`。However, visual styles will not be applied to the row and column headers because is set to `false`. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于确定哪个单元格位于第一行中，控件中当前显示的列。You can use this property to determine which cell is in the first row and column currently displayed in the control. 通常，这是左上角，但对于从右到左的语言，它是右上角。Typically, this is in the upper left corner, but for right-to-left languages, it is in the upper right corner. 你还可以设置此属性，以将控件滚动到指示的单元格。You can also set this property to scroll the control to the indicated cell. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确保排序后对当前单元格为可见。The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting. 此代码仅适用于未绑定控件。This code works only with an unbound control. 与控件绑定到外部数据源，当前单元格时，将不自动保留排序。With a control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`. 在 C# 中，你必须连接到事件处理程序的事件。In C#, you must also connect the event to the event handler. summary.span: 获取或设置 显示的文本的字体。

span.span: Gets or sets the font of the text displayed by the .

value.span: 要应用于由控件显示的文本的 。

span.span: The to apply to the text displayed by the control.

value.span: 默认为 属性的值。

span.span: The default is the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个环境属性。The property is an ambient property. 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，都不具有相同作为其父默认情况下。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅类或类概述。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 因为不可变 （这意味着你无法调整其任何属性），您可以只分配属性指定新对象。Because the is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the property a new object. 但是，您可以基于新的字体基于现有的字体。However, you can base the new font on the existing font. 控件使用的值属性的默认值作为属性返回的对象， ，和属性。The control uses the value of the property as the default value of the properties of objects returned by the , , and properties. 更改值会自动更新， ，和属性，更改继承值的任何单元格的字体。Changing the value automatically updates the , , and properties, changing the font for any cell that inherits the value. 标头单元格默认情况下，将重写值，并且你可以重写特定行、 列和单元格的值。Header cells override the value by default, and you can override the value for specific rows, columns, and cells. 有关单元格样式继承的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 创建未绑定的 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-an-unbound-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Create an Unbound Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-an-unbound-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound/CS/simpleunbound.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound/VB/simpleunbound.vb#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个环境属性。The property is an ambient property. 环境属性是控件属性，如果未设置，从父控件检索。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，都不具有相同作为其父默认情况下。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 有关环境属性的详细信息，请参阅类或类概述。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 因为不可变 （这意味着你无法调整其任何属性），您可以只分配属性指定新对象。Because the is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the property a new object. 但是，您可以基于新的字体基于现有的字体。However, you can base the new font on the existing font. 控件使用的值属性的默认值作为属性返回属性。The control uses the value of the property as the default value of the property of returned by the property. 更改值会自动更新更改继承值的任意单元格的前景文本颜色的属性。Changing the value automatically updates the property, changing the foreground text color for any cell that inherits the value. 标头单元格默认情况下，将重写值，并且你可以重写特定行、 列和单元格的值。Header cells override the value by default, and you can override the value for specific rows, columns, and cells. 有关单元格样式继承的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索表示选定单元格定义的区域的数据。This method retrieves data that represents the region defined by the selected cells. 此区域是最小的矩形包含所有选定的单元格。This region is the smallest rectangle that includes all of the selected cells. 在此区域中每个选定单元格的值通过调用检索方法。The value for each selected cell in this region is retrieved by calling the method. 对于未选定的单元格，在此区域将使用空白的占位符值。Blank placeholder values are used for unselected cells in this region. 此方法将合并到这些值包含几种格式复制到剪贴板。This method combines these values into a containing several formats for copying to the clipboard. 支持的剪贴板格式包括， ， ，和。The supported clipboard formats include , , , and . 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式添加所选到剪贴板的内容。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add selected content to the Clipboard. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 启用用户添加到复制到剪贴板从 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的多个单元](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于强制单元格重新绘制的通常不会导致进行重新绘制的单元格的条件。This method is useful to force a cell repaint in conditions that would not normally cause a cell to be repainted. 例如，你可以更改其外观由于外部事件的自定义单元格类型使用此方法。For example, you can use this method with a custom cell type that changes its appearance as a result of external events. 有关绘制和失效的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about painting and invalidation, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明了如何在单元格的外观会发生更改时用户将鼠标指针停留在它的自定义单元格类型中使用此方法。The following code example illustrates how to use this method in a custom cell type that changes a cell's appearance when the user rests the mouse pointer over it. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 自定义单元格和扩展他们行为和外观由 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-cells-and-columns-in-the-datagrid-by-extending-behavior.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize Cells and Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control by Extending Their Behavior and Appearance](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-cells-and-columns-in-the-datagrid-by-extending-behavior.md). summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许用户一次选择 的多个单元格、行或列。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to select more than one cell, row, or column of the at a time.

value.span: 如果用户一次可以选择多个单元格、行或列，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can select more than one cell, row, or column at a time; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，多个元素 （单元格、 行或列） 中可选择控件。When the property is set to `true`, multiple elements (cells, rows, or columns) can be selected in the control. 若要选择多个元素，用户可以按住 CTRL 键同时单击选择的元素。To select multiple elements, the user can hold down the CTRL key while clicking the elements to select. 通过单击选择的第一个元素，然后在按住 SHIFT 键，单击要选择的最后一个元素，则可以选择连续的元素。Consecutive elements can be selected by clicking the first element to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last element to select. 选择作用域取决于属性。The selection scope is based on the property. 例如，如果设置为，用户可以选择多个列。For example, if is set to , the user can select multiple columns. 你可以使用属性，以允许用户选择多个元素中的控制，执行对所有所选元素的操作。You can use the property to allow a user to select multiple elements in the control and perform an operation on all the selected elements. 例如，用户可以选择多个单元格，然后右键单击选定的单元格，以显示显示一组任务以执行上所选单元格的快捷菜单。For example, the user could select multiple cells and then right-click a selected cell to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks to perform on the selected cells. 若要确定中选定的单元格、 行或列控件，你可以访问， ，或属性。To determine which cells, rows, or columns are selected in the control, you can access the , , or property. 若要确定选定的单元格数，请调用方法的自变量值替换。To determine the number of selected cells, call the method with an argument value of . 使用方法来检索所选的行数和方法来检索其中的列数。Use the method to retrieve the number of selected rows and the method to retrieve the number of columns. 这些方法是比直接访问集合，使用大量的数据时效率更高。These methods are more efficient than accessing the collections directly when working with large amounts of data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`，然后调用`SetUpDataGridView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 确保所有事件都都其事件处理程序关联。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以用于允许自定义单元格类型，以通知时它们具有未提交的更改。This method can be used to allow custom cell types to notify the when they have uncommitted changes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义单元格方案中的此方法使用。The following code example illustrates the use of this method in a custom cell scenario. 在示例中，实现派生自类重写方法，并使用方法，以指示更改控件。In the example, an implementation derived from the class overrides the method and uses the method to indicate a change to the control. 此示例摘自更大的示例中所示[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格的主机控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#310](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#310)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#310](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#310)]

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `clipBounds`参数表示的区域，需要重新绘制。The `clipBounds` parameter represents the area of the that needs to be repainted. 例如，如果用户覆盖了整个用另一个窗口，然后将其，暴露则`clipBounds`表示整个。For example, if a user covers the entire with another window and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the entire . 如果用户覆盖的较小区域然后再将它，然后暴露`clipBounds`表示所涉及的小块区域。If a user covers a small area of the and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the small area that was covered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用密钥处理方法适合于按下的键 (例如，方法时按下 F2) 并返回该方法的返回值。This method calls the key-processing method appropriate to the key pressed (for example, the method when F2 is pressed) and returns the return value of that method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何更改中的 ENTER 键的行为通过重写子类和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to change the behavior of the ENTER key in a subclass by overriding the and methods. 在示例中，输入密钥都有相同的行为向右箭头键，使其更便于用户编辑数据的单个行中的多个单元格。In the example, the ENTER key has the same behavior as the RIGHT ARROW key, making it easier for a user to edit multiple cells in a single row of data. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可以编辑 控件的单元格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user can edit the cells of the control.

value.span: 如果用户不能编辑 控件的单元格，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user cannot edit the cells of the control; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单元格是只读的如果的值属性是`true`单元格、 单元格的行和单元格的列或。A cell is read-only if the value of the property is `true` for the cell, the cell's row, the cell's column, or the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在主要用于显示的控件。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

exception.span: 设置此属性时指定的值为 ，当前单元格处于编辑模式，并且当前单元格包含无法提交的更改。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property is , the current cell is in edit mode, and the current cell contains changes that cannot be committed.

exception.span: 当设置此属性时，指定的值将导致控件进入编辑模式，但是对正在编辑的单元格值的初始化失败，并且 事件没有处理程序，或者处理程序已将 属性设置为 。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the event or the handler has set the property to .

exception.span: 通常情况下，可将该异常对象强制转换为类型 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#274](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#274)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#274](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#274)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RefreshEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 当前单元格在处于编辑模式时，用基础单元格的值刷新当前单元格的值会丢弃以前的任何值。

span.span: Refreshes the value of the current cell with the underlying cell value when the cell is in edit mode, discarding any previous value.

returns.span: 如果成功，则为 ；如果发生了 事件，则为 。

span.span: if successful; if a event occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以强制单元格更新其显示值处于编辑模式。Call this method to force a cell to update its display value in edit mode. 当外部进程修改单元格的值，而且你想要通知的更改，用户，因此会丢失用户指定的更改的情况下，即使，这非常有用。This is useful when an external process modifies the cell value and you want to notify the user of the change, even when a user-specified change is lost as a result.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#338](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#338)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#338](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#338)]

summary.span: 在需要行的快捷菜单时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a row's shortcut menu is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时才会发生时控件设置属性或其属性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 处理事件非常有用，如果你想要显示由行的当前状态或它包含的值的快捷菜单。Handling the event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains. 当处理指定处理程序中的快捷菜单显示事件，每当用户右键单击某一行除非重写被单击的特定单元格的快捷菜单。When you handle the event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked. 每当也会发生事件的值属性检索时，或者以编程方式或当用户右键单击某一行。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row. 你可以使用属性以确定它包含的值或行的状态，使用此信息来更改或修改属性。You can use the property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性使用行的值初始化属性，该事件值重写属性。This property is initialized with the value of the row property, which the event value overrides. 处理事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置行的性能损失时为多行值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row value for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件，以便提供基于员工的标题。The following code example handles the event to provide a based on the title of the employee. 在此示例中，有两个快捷菜单，一个用于管理人员，一个用于所有其他员工。In this example, there are two shortcut menus, one for managers and one for all other employees. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/CS/Form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/VB/Form1.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 中显示的行数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in the .

value.span: 要在 中显示的行数。

span.span: The number of rows to display in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置将为一个值小于当前值，从末尾中删除行集合。If is set to a value less than the current value, rows will be removed from the end of the collection. 如果设置为值大于当前值的情况下，行将添加到末尾集合。If is set to a value greater than the current value, rows will be added to the end of the collection. 其他行基于中指定的行属性。The additional rows are based on the row specified in the property. 如果你设置属性设为 0，将从删除所有行。If you set the property to 0, all rows will be removed from the . 这是等效于调用方法。This is equivalent to calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果是`true`，无法设置为 0。If is `true`, you cannot set to 0. 在这种情况下，调用方法来删除除用于新纪录的行之外的所有行。In this case, call the method to remove all rows except the row for new records. 调用具有与设置相同的结果为在此情况下的 1，但较快得多。Calling has the same result as setting to 1 in this case, but is much faster. 属性可与属性创建一个简单用于显示和编辑文本。The property can be used with the property to create a simple for displaying and editing text. 如果你设置属性的值大于 0 的无列，控制自动添加。If you set the property to a value greater than 0 for a control without columns, a is added automatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 在此示例中，此属性用于跟踪中的条目数。In this example, this property is used to track the number of entries in a . 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. summary.span: 当行的 属性值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property for a row changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当任何一个时，将发生此事件的属性返回属性行设置为新值，或当行的属性设置为一个新而至少一个属性值不同于上一个单元格样式对象。This event occurs when any property of the returned by the property for a row is set to a new value or when the property for a row is set to a new with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
