summary.span: 在以下情况下发生：当 控件的 属性为 ，并且 需要确定当前行是否有未提交的更改时。

span.span: Occurs when the property of the control is and the needs to determine whether the current row has uncommitted changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此事件将设置属性`true`如果当前行中的任何单元格进行了修改。By default, this event sets the property to `true` if any cells in the current row have been modified. 这将导致事件发生时用户将恢复到的行的编辑。This causes the event to occur when the user reverts edits to a row. 用户可以通过按 esc 键两次时单元格处于编辑模式或第一次外部编辑模式恢复对行进行编辑。Users can revert edits to a row by pressing ESC twice when a cell is in edit mode or once outside of edit mode. 此事件可以用于通过设置自定义提交作用域中的虚拟模式为正确的值，具体取决于选定的提交范围的属性。This event can be used for customizing commit scope in virtual mode by setting the property to the correct value depending on the chosen commit scope. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何处理此事件来提供单元格级提交作用域，这意味着用户可以还原到当前单元格的更改。The following code example demonstrates how to handle this event to provide cell-level commit scope, meaning that the user can revert changes to the current cell only. 在单元格级提交范围中，行被视为具有未提交更改时，才当前单元格有未提交的更改，而不是当行中的任意单元格有未提交的更改。In cell-level commit scope, the row is treated as having uncommitted changes only when the current cell has uncommitted changes, rather than when any cell in the row has uncommitted changes. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[演练： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Implementing Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#160](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CPP/virtualmode.cpp#160)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#160](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CS/virtualmode.cs#160)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#160](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/VB/virtualmode.vb#160)]

summary.span: 用户双击两行间的分隔符时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks the divider between two rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可用于自定义当用户双击行分隔符时发生的自动调整大小行为。You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a row divider. 行属性不会扩展用户可在其中双击的区域。The row property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click. 如果已通过使用此属性增加了分隔符的高度，则当用户双击分隔线和相邻的列之间的边界发生此事件。If the height of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#342](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#342)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#342](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#342)]

summary.span: 在某一行接收到输入焦点但变成当前行之前发生。

span.span: Occurs when a row receives input focus but before it becomes the current row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件发生时最初加载时，以及当用户选择当前行以外的行。This event occurs when the is initially loaded, as well as when the user selects a row other than the current row. 此事件之前发生更新属性。This event occurs before the property is updated. 若要检索新输入行的索引，使用在事件处理程序内的属性。To retrieve the index of the newly-entered row, use the property within the event handler. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件以更改的当前行中单元格的属性。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the cells in the current row. 在此示例中，在中设置的背景色事件，然后重置为上事件。In this example, the background color is set in the event, then reset to on the event. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`，并确保所有事件都都与其事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. summary.span: 在需要某一行的错误文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a row's error text is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件时才会发生时属性控件设置或其属性是`true`。The event occurs only when the property of the control is set or its property is `true`. 处理事件非常有用，如果你想要确定具体取决于其状态以及它包含的值的行的错误。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains. 当处理事件，并指定错误文本中处理程序中，行标题中显示错误标志符号除非属性设置为`false`。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the property is set to `false`. 当用户移动鼠标指针放在错误图标上方时，错误文本将显示在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 每当也会发生事件的值检索属性。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 你可以使用属性以确定它包含的值或行的状态，使用此信息来更改或修改属性。You can use the property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the property. 此属性使用行的值初始化属性，该事件值重写属性。This property is initialized with the value of the row property, which the event value overrides. 处理事件使用大量的数据，若要避免设置行的性能损失时为多行值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row value for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以调整行标题的宽度，以及它是由用户调整还是根据标题的内容自动调整。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the width of the row headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.

value.span: 一个 值，指示可以在什么模式下调整行标题的宽度。

span.span: A value indicating the mode by which the width of the row headers can be adjusted.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为自动调整大小模式时，则无法由用户调整行标题的宽度。When this property is set to an automatic sizing mode, the width of the row headers cannot be adjusted by the user. 若要以编程方式调整行标题的高度，使用方法或一组属性。To adjust the height of the row headers programmatically, use the method or set the property. 若要设置列标题的大小调整模式，使用属性。To set the sizing mode for the column headers, use the property. 标头大小有关的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控件不支持双缓冲。The control does not support double buffering. 如果设置为`true`中派生控件，用户将不会收到可视反馈，或对列重新排序时调整行、 列或标头的大小。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性在主要用于显示的控件。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此示例中，以下几种方式自定义控件的可视外观和控件配置为有限的交互。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#40)]

summary.span: 请求有关行高度的信息时发生。

span.span: Occurs when information about row height is requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可用于在排序操作之后保留自定义行高。This event is useful for preserving custom row heights after a sorting operation. 这是必需的因为排序操作通常由数据源，不会不跟踪的数据行和控件中的行的对应关系。This is necessary because sorting operations are normally handled by the data source, which does not keep track of the correspondence between rows of data and rows in the control. 此事件时才会发生时设置属性时，或者当属性是`true`。This event occurs only when the property has been set or when the property is `true`. 在后一种情况下，你可以提供你自己的数据存储和排序操作。In the latter case, you provide your own data store and sorting operations. 处理事件，以存储更新后的高度的信息，当用户更改行高度。Handle the event to store updated height information when the user changes a row height. 使用以当控件需要它时检索存储的高度信息。Use to retrieve the stored height information when the control needs it. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#351](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#351)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#351](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#351)]

summary.span: 用户更改行高度时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user changes the height of a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将引发此事件时属性设置为`true`或属性设置为值`null`。This event is raised when the property is set to `true` or the property is set to a value other than `null`. 此事件用于跟踪和存储行高度信息，以便可以在排序操作之后还原它。This event is used to track and store row height information so that it can be restored after a sorting operation. 若要还原高度信息，请处理事件。To restore height information, handle the event. 请注意，仅当用户更改行的高度时，才会发生此事件。Note that this event occurs only when the user changes the height of a row. 如果以编程方式更改行的高度，你必须存储在同一时间的新高度信息。If you change the height of a row programmatically, you must store the new height information at the same time. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#352](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#352)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#352](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#352)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以处理此事件以更改的当前行中单元格的属性。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the cells in the current row. 在此示例中，在中设置的背景色事件，然后重置为上事件。In this example, the background color is set in the event, then reset to on the event. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`并确保所有事件都都与其事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowPostPaint As DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventHandler

summary.span: 在绘制 后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a is painted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单独使用或与结合使用，你可以处理此事件事件自定义控件中的行的外观。You can handle this event alone or in combination with the event to customize the appearance of rows in the control. 你可以绘制整个行，你自己，或特定部分的行并使用下列方法之一类来绘制其他部分：You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the class to paint other parts: - - - - - 你还可以使用类来绘制使用当前主题的标准控件。You can also use the class to paint standard controls using the current theme. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 如果你使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，你可以访问你可以使用的标准映像的大型库控件。If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的处理程序事件以绘制跨越在正常的单元格值下方的整个行的文本内容。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to paint textual content that spans the entire row below the normal cell values. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 单独使用或与结合使用，你可以处理此事件事件自定义控件中的行的外观。You can handle this event alone or in combination with the event to customize the appearance of rows in the control. 你可以绘制整个行，你自己，或特定部分的行并使用下列方法之一类来绘制其他部分：You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the class to paint other parts: - - - - - 你还可以使用类来绘制使用当前主题的标准控件。You can also use the class to paint standard controls using the current theme. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 如果你使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，你可以访问你可以使用的标准映像的大型库控件。If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the control. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用的处理程序事件以绘制渐变的行背景，如果选择的行。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to paint a gradient row background if the row is selected. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 自定义 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的行外观](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Rows As DataGridViewRowCollection

summary.span: 获取一个集合，该集合包含 控件中的所有行。

span.span: Gets a collection that contains all the rows in the control.

value.span: 一个 ，包含 控件中的所有行。

span.span: A that contains all the rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用集合来手动填充控件而不是将其绑定到数据源。You can use the collection to manually populate a control instead of binding it to a data source. 下面的示例演示了如何手动添加并插入新行。The following example shows you how to manually add and insert rows. 此示例假定你已添加四个到控件的实例集合。This example assumes that you have added four instances to the control's collection. ```vb Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight") Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four") ``` ```csharp this.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight");this.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four"); ``` 有关以编程方式填充未绑定的详细示例控件，请参见示例部分。For a detailed example that programmatically populates an unbound control, see the Example section. 行中包含样式信息以及单元格的值。Rows include style information in addition to cell values. 为此，你可能想要添加或插入基于你已经设置样式的现有行的行。For this reason, you might want to add or insert rows based on existing rows that you have already styled. 你可以执行此使用， ， ，和方法。You can do this using the , , , and methods. 你还可以使用集合来修改控件中的值或删除的行。You can also use the collection to modify the values in the control or to remove rows. 你可以修改值或删除行而不考虑是否将控件绑定到外部数据源。You can modify values or remove rows regardless of whether the control is bound to an external data source. 如果没有数据源，所做的更改进行直接到数据源。If there is a data source, the changes are made directly to the data source. 你可能仍需要将数据源更新推送到远程数据库，但是。You may still need to push the data source updates to a remote database, however. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将数据绑定到 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-data-to-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-data-to-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式修改单元格的值。The following example shows you how to modify cell values programmatically. ```vb ' Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. Me.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value" ' The previous line is equivalent to the following line. Me.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value" ``` ```csharp // Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. this.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value"; // The previous line is equivalent to the following line. this.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value"; ``` 除了标准的集合功能，你可以使用集合来检索有关行的信息。In addition to the standard collection capabilities, you can use the collection to retrieve information about rows. 使用方法来确定特定行的状态。Use the method to determine the state of a particular row. 使用和方法，以确定的行数或行中某一特定状态的组合的高度。Use the and methods to determine the number of rows or the combined height of rows in a particular state. 若要检索具有特定状态的行的索引，请使用， ， ，和方法。To retrieve the index of a row with a particular state, use the , , , and methods. 下面的示例演示了如何检索第一个所选行的索引，然后使用它以编程方式删除该行。The following example shows you how to retrieve the index of the first selected row, and then use it to programmatically delete the row. ```vb Dim rowToDelete As Int32 = Me.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( _ DataGridViewElementStates.Selected) If rowToDelete > -1 Then Me.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete) End If ``` ```csharp Int32 rowToDelete = this.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( DataGridViewElementStates.Selected); if (rowToDelete > -1) { this.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete); } ``` 若要提高性能，返回属性可以包含共享和取消共享行。To improve performance, the returned by the property can include shared and unshared rows. 共享的行共享内存以减少大型的记录集的成本。Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set. 如果您的记录集非常大，你应小心地保证共享行尽可能多地访问时属性。If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible when accessing the property. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建未绑定; 设置， ，和属性; 并使用和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to create an unbound ; set the , , and properties; and use the and properties. 它还演示如何使用的版本和方法正确调整列标题和行的大小。It also demonstrates how to use a version of the and methods to properly size the column headers and the rows. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`和名为的按钮`Button1`，然后调用`InitializeDataGridView`从窗体的构造函数的方法或事件处理程序。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and a button named `Button1`, and then call the `InitializeDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 确保所有事件已都连接到其事件处理程序。Ensure all events are connected with their event handlers. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/VB/form1.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowsAdded As DataGridViewRowsAddedEventHandler

summary.span: 在向 中添加新行之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a new row is added to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 添加新行时，控件中的行未自动排序。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added. 若要对新的行进行排序为正确的位置，调用中的方法事件处理程序。To sort new rows into their correct position, call the method in a event handler. 当用户将添加新行，对于新记录，请使用行值处理程序中此事件是相等的新记录所在行的新位置的索引这是一个大于刚刚添加的行。When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the value in the handler for this event is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added. 添加新行时以编程方式，但是，值是添加的第一行的索引。When you add rows programmatically, however, the value is the index of the first row added. 在虚拟模式下，此事件发生之前事件，可以用于在数据存储区，然后，您可以填充在中创建新记录事件处理程序。In virtual mode, this event occurs before the event and can be used to create new records in your data store that you can then populate in the event handler. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件以增加的虚拟行数。The following code example handles the event to increment the number of rows in a virtual . 中使用的行数处理程序，使它知道何时显示与初始化新行的单元格的空白单元格。The number of rows is used in the handler so it knows when to show a blank cell versus an initialized cell for a new row. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供参考主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ RowsDefaultCellStyle { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewCellStyle ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置应用于 的行单元格的默认样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the default style applied to the row cells of the .

value.span: 要应用于 的行单元格的 。

span.span: The to apply to the row cells of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件将显示其使用指示的单元格的样式的单元格属性，该类继承自其他类型的属性的样式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 对于所有行中的单元格，不包括标头单元格，通过指定的样式属性重写通过指定的样式和属性，并且由通过指定的样式重写， ，和属性。For cells in all rows, excluding header cells, the styles specified through the property override the styles specified through the and properties, and are overridden by the styles specified through the , , and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 获取此属性时如果未访问属性，则将创建具有默认值。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 获取此属性为多个行时，这可能导致性能造成负面影响。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 只要有可能，使用单个设置此属性对于多个行。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 有关详细信息，请参阅[缩放 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的最佳做法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性来创建在帐目型效果控件。The following code example illustrates how to use this property to create a ledger effect in a control. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件发生时的一个属性返回属性设置为新值时，或者当属性设置为一个新而至少一个属性值不同于上一个单元格样式对象。This event occurs when a property of the returned by the property is set to a new value or when the property is set to a new with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewRow ^ RowTemplate { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewRow ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewRow ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一行，该行表示控件中所有行的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the row that represents the template for all the rows in the control.

value.span: 表示行模板的 。

span.span: A representing the row template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有时你希望更好地控制的外观行少于所提供的各种内容单元格样式属性。Sometimes you want greater control over the appearance of rows than what is provided by the various cell style properties. 属性，可以创建和初始化以用作模板的所有行，包括用于新纪录的行 （如果是`true`。The property lets you create and initialize a for use as a template by all rows, including the row for new records if is `true`. 在设置属性，例如行高度的默认值时，这很有用。This is useful when you are setting default values for properties such as row height. 例如，你可能想要增加以便显示跨多个列的内容提供额外的空间下普通单元格内容的默认行高度。For example, you may want to increase the default row height in order to provide extra room beneath ordinary cell content for displaying content that spans multiple columns. 设置行模板时是必需的外部数据使用自定义派生自的类型来显示类。Setting the row template is necessary when external data is displayed using custom types derived from the class. 对于未绑定控件，你可以以编程方式填充与自定义的行类型的实例的集合。With unbound controls, you can programmatically populate the collection with instances of your custom row type. 显示外部数据时，但是，行自动生成的但它们基于行模板，可以设置为你自定义的行类型的实例。When displaying external data, however, the rows are generated automatically, but they are based on the row template, which you can set to an instance of your custom row type. 如果尚未设置此属性检索其值，第一次新创建并返回。If this property has not been set the first time you retrieve its value, a new is created and returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用行模板指定初始行高度和最小行高度。The following code example illustrates how to use the row template to specify an initial row height and a minimum row height. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate/CPP/datagridviewrowtemplate.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate/CS/datagridviewrowtemplate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate/VB/datagridviewrowtemplate.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件是类似于事件。This event is analogous to the event. 使用此事件来对所有行的值执行验证。Use this event to perform validation on all the values of a row. 如果该行未通过验证，设置属性`true`。If the row does not pass validation, set the property to `true`. 取消此事件可防止， ，和事件的发生，还可防止用户离开无效的行并防止行保存到外部数据源中数据绑定模式。Canceling this event prevents the , , and events from occurring, and also prevents the user from leaving the invalid row and prevents the row from being saved to an external data source in data bound mode. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用以检查是否输入了有效的跟踪和发布日期。The following code example uses to check if valid track and release dates are entered. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当为列选择模式，此方法调用时，每个列的属性设置为`true`，和每个行的属性设置为`false`。When the is in column-selection mode and this method is called, each column's property is set to `true`, and each row's property is set to `false`. 相反，当是行选择模式，此方法调用时，每个行的属性设置为`true`，而每一列属性设置为`false`。Conversely, when the is in row-selection mode and this method is called, each row's property is set to `true`, and each column's property is set to `false`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 若要运行此示例，请将代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`和名为`selectAllButton`，并确保所有事件都都与其事件处理程序相关联。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and a named `selectAllButton`, and ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不考虑始终填充属性属性值。The property is always populated regardless of the property value. 此属性包含在引用它时所选内容的只读快照。This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced. 如果您留此集合的副本，可能不同于实际后续顺序用户可能已更改所选内容的状态。If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent state in which the user may have changed the selection. 因此，您应不执行操作在集合的副本。Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用集合，以便在所选内容中查找值的总和。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to find the sum of the values in the selection. 在示例中，然后，循环访问此集合和有效的值添加到在标签中显示的总和。In the example, this collection is iterated through and the valid values are added to the sum, which is displayed in a label. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性必须设置为或为属性使用填充选定的行。The property must be set to or for the property to be populated with selected rows. 此属性包含在引用它时所选内容的只读快照。This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced. 如果您留此集合的副本，可能不同于实际后续顺序用户可能已更改所选内容的状态。If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent state in which the user may have changed the selection. 您应因此不执行操作在集合的副本。You should therefore not operate on a copy of the collection. 若要以编程方式选择某一行，将设置其属性`true`。To programmatically select a row, set its property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的属性事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in the event. 在此示例中，如果第一行包含在集合中，则删除操作已取消。In this example, if the first row is contained in the collection, then the deletion is canceled. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 选定的单元格或取消所选内容时，是否通过编程方式或用户执行任何操作时，将发生此事件。This event occurs whenever cells are selected or the selection is canceled, whether programmatically or by user action. 例如，此事件非常有用，当你想显示当前选定的单元格的总和时。For example, this event is useful when you want display the sum of the currently selected cells. 当你更改的值属性，事件之前发生事件。When you change the value of the property, the event occurs before the event. 任何事件处理程序访问此时属性将获取其以前的值。Any event handler accessing the property at this time will get its previous value. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此事件。The following code example demonstrates the use of this event. 在示例中，该窗体将选定的单元格中显示值的总和和所选内容更改时，更新之和。In the example, the form displays the sum of values in the selected cells, and updates the sum when the selection changes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值时`true`和鼠标指针位于单元格，该单元格显示工具提示，当满足以下条件之一：When the value of this property is `true` and the mouse pointer is over a cell, the cell displays a ToolTip when one of the following conditions is met: - 值属性不是`null`或值属性是`true`，和的处理程序事件集属性的值以外的其他。The value of the property is not `null` or the value of the property is `true`, and a handler for the event sets the property to a value other than . - 单元格的属性具有值以外。The property of the cell has a value other than . 将此属性设置不起作用时事件处理程序因为自动获取属性的值引发事件并返回的工具提示文本指定在事件处理程序。Setting this property has no effect when there is a event handler because getting the value of the property automatically raises the event and returns the ToolTip text specified in the event handler. - 单元格的值被截断在单元格显示中。The cell value is truncated in the cell display. 当单元格的值属性值是，截断的单元格的值的完整值显示工具提示中。When the value of the cell property value is , the full value of the truncated cell value is displayed in the ToolTip.

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行标题将显示类似于铅笔，当前单元格处于编辑模式，并且用户已向单元格进行的更改时编辑标志符号。The row header will display an editing glyph that looks like a pencil when the current cell is in edit mode and the user has made changes to the cell. 编辑标志符号会变色使用行标题单元格的属性。The editing glyph is colored by using the property of the row header cell. 如果没有足够的空间来完全显示，则不会呈现标志符号。The glyph is not rendered if there is not enough space to display it completely. 例如，如果行标题单元格具有其移除属性集，标志符号，如果没有为文本和字形足够的空间。For example, if the row header cell has its property set, the glyph is removed if there is not enough room for both the text and glyph. 显示编辑标志符号的值由控制中的虚拟模式属性。The display of the editing glyph is controlled by the value of the property in virtual mode. 否则，它由控制属性。Otherwise, it is controlled by the property. 公开不公开的标准标志符号。The standard glyph is not publicly exposed. 要自定义标志符号，可以创建自定义类。To customize the glyph, you can create a custom class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否在行中单元格之一时出错。The property indicates if there is an error in one of the cells in a row. 如果设置一个值为非，然后为错误标志符号 (![ErrorProvider 图标](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider 图标")) 的行标题中所示。If is set to a value other than , then an error glyph (![ErrorProvider icon](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider icon")) is shown in the row header. 行标题的默认宽度包括足够空间来显示错误标志符号，显示标志符号。The default width of the row header includes enough room to display the error glyph, whether or not the glyph is displayed. 如果行标题的大小调整，以便没有足够的空间来完全显示标志符号，则不会呈现标志符号。If the row header size is adjusted so that there is not enough space to display the glyph completely, the glyph is not rendered. 因为文本和标志符号，可以显示行标题，标头将显示内容按优先级别，如下所示：Because row headers can display both text and glyphs, header content is displayed by priority, as follows: 1. 显示在行标题单元格的文本。Text displayed in the row header cell. 2. 编辑标志符号。The editing glyph. 3. 错误标志符号。The error glyph. 例如，如果在行的宽度会降低，错误标志符号会消失第一次，然后标准标志符号，则文本。For example, if the row width is decreased, the error glyph disappears first, then the standard glyph, then text. 高级的用户可以通过开发一个自定义自定义错误标志符号或类。Advanced users can customize the error glyph by developing a custom or class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许的排序功能的高级自定义类。This method allows advanced customization of the sorting feature of the class. 为了实现高度自定义排序操作，你可以编写的事件处理程序事件和调用此方法与实现的类的实例作为参数的接口。In order to implement a highly customized sorting operation, you can write an event handler for the event and call this method with an instance of a class that implements the interface as a parameter. 在这种情况下，通常将设置属性禁用自动排序并留出空间的排序标志符号。In this case, you will typically set the property to to disable automatic sorting and to leave room for a sorting glyph. 在排序时将设置为编程排序模式的列，您必须显示排序标志符号自己通过设置属性。When sorting by columns set to programmatic sort mode, you must display the sorting glyph yourself by setting the property. 此方法时才起作用未设置属性。This method works only when the property is not set. 当绑定控件到外部数据源，您必须使用提供该数据源的排序操作。When you bind the control to an external data source, you must use the sorting operations provided by that data source. 在您自己的数据源提供通过实现虚拟模式时，你还必须处理的排序操作自己。When you provide your own data source by implementing virtual mode, you must also handle the sorting operations yourself. 调用此方法会自动设置属性`null`。Calling this method automatically sets the property to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用在多个列排序方案中的方法重载。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method overload in a multiple column sort scenario. 在此示例中，中实现接口`RowComparer`类。In this example, the interface is implemented in the `RowComparer` class. summary.span: 基于指定列的内容，按升序或降序对 控件的内容进行排序。

span.span: Sorts the contents of the control in ascending or descending order based on the contents of the specified column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的内容进行排序通过比较指定列中的值。This method sorts the contents of the by comparing values in the specified column. 默认情况下，排序操作将使用方法来比较的在列中使用的单元格对属性。By default, the sort operation will use the method to compare pairs of cells in the column using the property. 列属性设置为、和属性自动设置，则显示相应的排序标志符号。For columns with the property set to , the and properties are set automatically and the appropriate sorting glyph is displayed. 列属性设置为，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号属性。For columns with the property set to , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 你可以自定义排序操作使用此方法通过处理事件。You can customize the sorting operation used by this method by handling the event. 此事件时才会发生时未设置属性。This event occurs only when the property has not been set. 当已设置属性，此方法适用于仅限数据绑定列。When the property has been set, this method works for data-bound columns only. 数据绑定列中获得了其属性集。Data-bound columns have had their property set. 这将导致属性以返回`true`。This causes the property to return `true`. 如果你控件包含绑定和未绑定列，则必须实现虚拟模式时对控件进行排序的绑定的列保持未绑定列的值。If your control contains both bound and unbound columns, you must implement virtual mode to maintain the values of the unbound columns when the control is sorted by a bound column. 你可以执行此操作通过设置属性`true`和处理事件。You can do this by setting the property to `true` and handling the event. 如果列是可编辑，则还应处理事件。If the column is editable, you should also handle the event. 有关虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 不支持数据绑定控件时，按未绑定列进行排序。Sorting by unbound columns when the control is data-bound is not supported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的编程排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the in a programmatic sort. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SortCompare As DataGridViewSortCompareEventHandler

summary.span: 在 对两个单元格的值进行比较以执行排序操作时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the compares two cell values to perform a sort operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件时才会发生时未设置属性和属性值是`false`。This event occurs only when the property is not set and the property value is `false`. 此事件将对正在排序的列中的单元格进行比较。This event compares pairs of cells in the column being sorted. 仅当用户单击与列的标头时，才发生属性值，或当调用重载。It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a property value of , or when you call the overload. 当发生此事件时对具有的列属性值，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号属性。When this event occurs for a column with a property value of , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 你可以使用此事件在一个列或多个列中使用的单元值的行进行排序。You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns. 使用和属性中指定的列中的单元格值进行比较属性。Use the and properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the property. 使用和属性，以访问通过其他列中的值集合。Use the and properties to access values in other columns through the collection. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中多个列进行排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the in a multiple column sort. 此示例摘自[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中自定义排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Sorted As EventHandler

summary.span: 在 控件完成排序操作时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control completes a sorting operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件不会发生时属性设置为`true`和控件按的未绑定列进行排序。This event does not occur when the property is set to `true` and the control is sorted by an unbound column. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何确保排序后对当前单元格为可见。The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting. 此代码仅适用于未绑定控件。This code works only with an unbound control. 与控件绑定到外部数据源，当前单元格时，将不自动保留排序。With a control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting. 若要运行此示例，请将以下代码粘贴到一个包含窗体名为`dataGridView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`. 在 C# 中，你必须连接到事件处理程序的事件。In C#, you must also connect the event to the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#150)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#150)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SortedColumn As DataGridViewColumn

summary.span: 获取 内容的当前排序所依据的列。

span.span: Gets the column by which the contents are currently sorted.

value.span: 内容的当前排序所依据的 。

span.span: The by which the contents are currently sorted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未排序，则此属性将返回`null`。If the is not sorted, this property will return `null`. 当此属性指示的列具有属性值，它将显示基于值的排序标志符号属性。When the column indicated by this property has a property value of , it will display a sorting glyph based on the value of the property. 当列具有属性值，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号属性。When the column has a property value of , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. > [!NOTE] > 使用自定义排序的控件进行排序时，此属性的值没有意义。The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting. 有关自定义排序的详细信息，请参阅方法和事件。For more information about custom sorting, see the method and the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的编程排序属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in a programmatic sort. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/VB/form1.vb#10)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是按升序或降序对 控件中的项进行排序，还是不排序。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the items in the control are sorted in ascending or descending order, or are not sorted.

value.span: 值之一。

span.span: One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于确定指定的列时，将显示的排序标志符号属性具有属性值。This property is used to determine which sorting glyph appears when the column specified by the property has a property value of . 当列具有属性值，您必须显示，并且通过自己隐藏排序标志符号属性。When the column has a property value of , you must display and hide the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 当列具有属性值，可以显示排序标志符号，但如果自动调整列的大小不为其保留空间。When the column has a property value of , you can display the sorting glyph, but space is not reserved for it if the column is automatically resized. > [!NOTE] > 使用自定义排序的控件进行排序时，此属性的值没有意义。The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting. 有关自定义排序的详细信息，请参阅方法和事件。For more information about custom sorting, see the method and the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的编程排序属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in a programmatic sort. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StandardTab { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示按 Tab 键是否会将焦点按 Tab 键顺序移到下一个控件，而不是将焦点移到控件中的下一个单元格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order rather than moving focus to the next cell in the control.

value.span: 如果按 Tab 键会将焦点按 Tab 键顺序移到下一个控件，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性设置为`false`允许使用 TAB 键将焦点的单元格的网格中移动。Setting this property to `false` allows the TAB key to move the focus through the grid of cells. 下表介绍单元格焦点按给定的 TAB 键组合时的更改。The following table describes how the cell focus changes when the given TAB key combinations are pressed. |组合键Key combination|结果Result| |---------------------|------------| |TabTAB|如果属性是`false`，在焦点移动到下一个单元格的行中。If the property is `false`, the focus moves to the next cell in the row. 如果将焦点放在行中的最后一个单元，在焦点移动到下一行中的第一个单元格。If the focus is in the last cell in the row, the focus moves to the first cell in the next row. 如果中的最后一个单元的焦点位于，在焦点移到下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。If the focus is in the last cell in the , the focus moves to the next control in the tab order.| |Shift+TabSHIFT+TAB|如果是`false`，在焦点移动到上一个单元格的行中。If is `false`, the focus moves to the previous cell in the row. 如果焦点位于行中的第一个单元格，焦点移到的最后一个前一行中的单元格。If the focus is in the first cell in the row, the focus moves to the last cell in the previous row. 如果中的第一个单元的焦点位于，在焦点移动到上一个控件的 tab 键顺序。If the focus is in the first cell in the , the focus moves to the previous control in the tab order.| |Ctrl+TabCTRL+TAB|焦点移到下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。The focus moves to the next control in the tab order.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性可以设置单元格的值，通过该对话框，关联的快捷菜单或执行你可以对执行的任何其他操作。Setting this property allows you to set a value for the cell, associate a shortcut menu with it, or perform any other operations you can perform on a . 在设计用于从右到左语言的应用程序，表示此属性的单元格通常是右上角。In applications designed for use with right-to-left languages, the cell represented by this property is typically in the upper-right corner. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此属性来显示值的左上角控件。The following code example uses this property to display a value in the upper-left corner of a control. 此值标签主/从方案中的子表。This value labels a child table in a master/detail scenario. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述主题。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法在维护单元格错误文本自己通过处理事件。Use this method when you maintain cell error text yourself by handling the event. 当您更改指定的单元格的存储的错误文本时，请调用此方法。Call this method when you change the stored error text for the specified cell. 这将使该单元格，强制要检索更新的错误文本通过控件事件处理程序。This will invalidate the cell, forcing the control to retrieve the updated error text through the event handler. 你可以使用此方法更新标题单元格的错误，但列标题单元格不会显示错误标志符号。Although you can use this method to update errors for header cells, column header cells do not display error glyphs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虚拟模式旨在用于使用非常大的数据存储。Virtual mode is designed for use with very large stores of data. 当属性是`true`，你创建带有一组的行和列，然后处理事件以填充单元格。When the property is `true`, you create a with a set number of rows and columns and then handle the event to populate the cells. 虚拟模式需要实现的基础的数据缓存，以处理填充、 编辑和删除单元格基于用户的操作。Virtual mode requires implementation of an underlying data cache to handle the population, editing, and deletion of cells based on actions of the user. 有关实现虚拟模式的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about implementing virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 必须使用的虚拟模式来维护未绑定列的值时控件是否处于绑定模式。You must use virtual mode to maintain the values of unbound columns when the control is in bound mode. 不支持按在绑定模式下的未绑定列进行排序。Sorting by unbound columns in bound mode is not supported. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用的虚拟模式创建的表的正整数。The following code example code uses virtual mode to create a table of positive integers.
